name.zh: 電機與電子群教學實習
name.en: Teaching Practicum for the Area of Electrical and Electronics Subjects

description.zh: 本課程的目標是教導有志從事電機電子群教學工作的學生，使其能熟悉電機電子群課程綱要，準備分析及運用教材，練習教案的編製與運用，練習靈活運用教學法，教學技術，熟知學校常規，設計與指定作業以及練習教學評鑑與學習評量，使從參與行動中接觸各種實際經驗，以便畢業後能須利適應教學情境。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The object of this course is to lead the students to know how to be a good instructor with good instructional methods and skills learned from this course. For achieving this goal, this course presents the students with basic theories of instructions, makes them study from demonstration in high school and among themselves, directs them to practices the making of inst4ucting plans. After finishing this course, the students should have learned how to make sure of the standard of the subjects they are going to teach; how to prepare, analyze and skillfully use the teaching material, how to make and skillfully use the instructing plans, how to actively use instructing methods and skills, how to will know and use the school or class rules, how to design and assign exercise, how to evaluate instruction and learning. As a result, they must become good teachers in the future.

notes: 化工、化學、電機電子群合班授課

description.zh: 本課程目標如下:(一)充實學生各種激發快樂學習、健康成長的學識，以培養適任的優良教師；（二）提供學生班級教學及班級導師工作的實務經驗與做法，使具備有效處理教學與班級事務的良好技能﹔(三)奠定學生熱忱積極經營班級之理念，養成學生教育專業精神，使其在從事教育工作時能發揮愛心與熱忱來欣賞及參與班級的各種活動。 本課程的內容涵蓋班級經營的學理基礎;班級經營的目標、計劃與評鑑;教學、行政之經營;導師的任務與素養;學生自治活動、教學情境佈置;班級氣氛與學習;班級的評量設計;有關安置、生活、學習、行為等方面的問題與對策等 本課程利用講授法、小組討論法、發表法等方式進行教學，盡量在教學過程中探討教室內各種發生的狀況尋求最佳解決方式，且進行發展積極、和諧、快樂的師生互動模式之探討以利學生在未來擔任教師時能駕輕就熟於班級經營工作，而達成本課程之目標 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-2具備展現協作與領導之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(備註：本資料係由本校各教學單位、教務處課務組、進修部教務組、進修學院教務組及計網中心所共同提供！本資料僅供參考，正式資料仍以教務處、進修部、進修學院所公佈之書面資料為準。

本課程主要探討當前重要教育議題，如:藝術與美感教育、性別教育、人權教育、勞動教育、法治教育、生命教育、品德教育、多元文化教育、新移民教育、原住民教育、媒體素養教育、生涯發展教育、環境教育、藥物教育、性教育、國際教育等各類教育議題。本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The course is aimed to provide current issues in education, such as: artistic and aesthetic education, gender education, human rights education, labor education, legal education, life education, moral education, multicultural education, new immigrants education, aboriginal education, media literacy education, career development education, environmental education, drug education , sex education , international education and other education issues.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生： 1.了解服務學習的意義與理念。 2.具備規劃服務學習活動或方案的能力 3.執行教育專業相關的服務活動與方案 4.具備團隊合作與問題解決能力 5.遵守教育專業人員的倫理規範 6.反思服務的成果，增進專業成長 7.運用個人教育專業知能服務人群 8.透過教育服務中反省自己的教學專業知能 9.透過教育專業服務，習得教育專業人員的服務倫理 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。4-2具備展現協作與領導之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The course is aimed to provide practicing administrative, teaching and classroom management affairs at internship schools. In addition, the course is aimed to cultivate students to have educational professional ethics among the interactions with teachers and students of internship schools.

name.en: Intellectual Property Management for Global Brands

description.zh: 於高科技、知識經濟時代，作為無形資產之「全球品牌」，已成為促進公司價值及成長之引擎。此全球品牌大時代氛圍，「全球品牌」策略愈發重要。品牌策略管理在提供客戶認知、產品績效及企業價值。藉由品牌溝通，品牌創造客戶對品牌之熟悉及偏好，而達成商業管理目標，進而提昇股東價值及股價市值。本課程將就下列議題及知名品牌運作模式為說明：一、品牌發展策略，二、品牌價值，三、品牌商標保護策略(即1. 商標計畫，2. 商標執行，3. 商標控制）。四、公司治理與品牌管理。五、智財品牌授權。
description.en: In High-tech knowledge economy, as intangible assets "global brand", has become an engine for raising company value. During this global brand era, "global brand" strategy is important for enhancing customer awareness and business performance.  Through diversified brand communication, global brand creates customer familiarity and preference, and to achieve business goals, thereby enhancing shareholder value.The course focuses on the following topics: First, the brand development strategy, Second, brand value, Third, brand & trademark protection strategy. Fourth, corporate governance and brand management. .Fifth, intellectual property/brand licensing.

description.zh: 民法總則介紹民法中的共通概念與基本原則，為整部民法以及所有法律的學習基礎。透過民法總則之學習，同學可以熟悉法律的思考模式及規範架構。本課程將以理論與實務並重方式協助同學學習。
description.en: The General Principle of the Civil Law serves to introduce the common concept and fundamental principle of the Civil Law.  In short, the General Principle of the Civil Law predominates as a learning basis for the whole Civil Law and all legal study.  Through learning on the General Principle of the Civil Law, students can be familiar with the model of legal thought and the framework of norm.  This course aims to assist students learning from both theory and practice.

description.zh: 本課程主要關注台灣專利申請的程序觀點。其相關的主題包括發明人身份、專利權人（專利申請權人）身份、優先權、申請格式、發明人訪談、審查意見答覆寫作、訴願狀寫作和專利申請策略。此外，國際專利申請的實務觀點也會在課堂上討論以做為比較。本課程教材包括專利申請教科書、各國專利申請基準、和法院判決等。
description.en: This course focuses on the procedural aspect of the patent prosecution in Taiwan. The topics cover inventorship, ownership (including a right to file a patent application), priority, formality, inventor interview, office action response drafting, petition brief drafting, and patent filing strategy.  In addition, the practical aspect of international patent prosecution is presented for comparison. The class materials include a patent prosecution textbook, patent examination guidelines from different counties, and court decisions.

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之修正、分割申請及改請申請，以及專利權期間延長案。
description.en: This course is to introduce the formality examination and the substantive examination based upon the "Patent Examination Guideline" issued by the TIPO, including the formality of the patent application, and the allowable subjects for patent, utility, novelty, inventive steps, first-to-file, priority claim, amendment, divisional application, and the extension of patent term and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要講授重點包括刑事訴訟基本理念與原則、迴避與管轄、證據法則、以及刑事訴訟之程序與執行等，並將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於刑事訴訟法的瞭解。
description.en: This course focuses on the basic concept , disqualification, jurisdiction, evidence rule, and execution of the law of criminal procedure. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Law of Criminal Procedure for the students.

description.zh: n
description.en: n

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

description.zh: 愈來愈多的商業活動在網路上進行，蓬勃發展的電子商務，也對現有的法律與政策造成許多挑戰。本課程將對電子商務的發展做一概要介紹，其後由網路科技與智財法律的概論談起，接著以目前智財法規所面臨的議題為主，並挑選台灣與國際的知名案例，讓學生兼顧理論與實務，建立對電子商務法規與政策發展的認識。
description.en: Doing business online is more and more prevalent nowadays, nonetheless, as e-commerce activities striving rapidly, new legal challenges are calling for attention. This course will start with an introduction on the characteristics and developments of e-commerce activities, following by the exploration and discussion on relevant literature and cases. Noted that this course will focus on the intellectual property laws and make comparative studies in order to equip students with an in-depth understanding and knowledge on these issues.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

description.zh: 本課程內容含有: (1)簡介。(2)貯氫合金種類(3)貯氫合金結構與性質(4)貯氫合金製程---機械冶金(5)貯氫合金製程---真空感應熔煉(6)貯氫材料之吸放氫測量方法(7)貯氫合金應用(8)鎳氫電池材料(9)奈米碳材之結構與性質(10)奈米碳材之製程(11)奈米碳材之應用(12)氫燃料電池---質子交換膜材料(13)氫燃料電池---膜電極組材料
description.en: The class includes :1.Course Introduction, 2.Classes of Hydrogen Storage Alloys (HSAs),3. Structure and Properties of HSAs,4. Production of HSAs ---Mechanical Alloying Process,5.,roduction of HSAs ---Vacuum Induction Melting (VIM) Process,6.. Method of Measuring Storage Capacity for Hydrogen Storage Materials,7. Application of HSAs,8. Materials of Nickel Hydride Battery Electrode,9. Structure and Properties of Carbon Nano Tubes (CNTs), 10. Production of CNTs, 11. Application of CNTs,12. Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Proton Exchange Membrane, 13 Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Membrane Electrode Assembly (MEA)

name.zh: 進階穿透式電子顯微鏡學

description.zh: 進階穿透式電子顯微鏡學 1.內容簡介 2. 進階電子繞射及散射3.透鏡及孔鏡 4.設備原理 5.繞射圖案 6.菊池線之應用 7.收斂束繞射圖案 8.影像厚度及彎曲效應 9.缺陷及應力場之效應10.高解析度原子影像 11.電子能量損失能譜 12.試片製作
description.en: Advance in Transmission electron microscopy 1.Introduction 2.Scattering and diffraction 3.Lenses and apertures 4.Instrument 5.Diffraction patterns 6.Kikuchi diffraction 7.Convergent-beam techniques 8.Thickness and bending effects 9.Planar defects and strain fields 10. High-resolution TEM images 11. Electron energy-loss spectrometers 12. Specimen preparation.

name.en: Topic of Powder Science and Technology

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

description.zh: 本課程主要是講述由粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結電接點材料、燒結機械另件燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過粉末冶金課程的學生，能進一步對粉末冶金技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en: The course mainly lecture the materials and products which are made by powdermetallurgy techniques, including high melting material, super hard material, superheat resistant material, sintered electricjoint material, sintered mechanical parts, sintered friction material, sintered magnetic material, etc., it is expected students wholearn the powder metallurgy course may have further understanding to theapplication of powder metallurgy techniques.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬.陶瓷與高分子性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of metallic, ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materials for dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 粉末冶金是工業先進國家積極發展的重點科技之一，其內容涵蓋粉末製造、粉末成形固結以及燒結體的後處理等範圍，本課程即安排包括粉末製造、粉末特性與其測定、粉末混合與造粒、成形、燒結理論與實務、燒結體性質與其測定、燒結體的後處理等基礎項目。另外，再講述利用粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品的實務應用項目等，以期讓學生能對粉末冶金技術能有基本上的認識。
description.en: Powder metallurgy is one of the most important highlighted high-tech in the developed countries, its content includes powder making,powder formation and condensing,and the final treatment of sintered body,etc.Thus, this course includes the fundamental items such as powder manufacturing, powder characteristics and its test, powder mixing and granulation, formation, sintering theory and practice, the property of sintering body and its test, the post-treatment of sintering body. Besides, it also lectures practice method like using powder metallurgy to manufacture material and product, in order to let students have basic knowledge about powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 本課程討論，利用儀器分析工作之理論，儀器之原理，構造操作及計算等。包括光譜化學，原子吸收光譜，電漿發射光譜儀，發光光譜儀，電分析化學，PH計，電解沉澱法，伏安法，極譜儀，等儀器之探討。
description.en: This course discusses the theoryof instrumental analysis operation, the principle of instrument, structural operation and calculation. It includes spectrum chemistry, atomic absorption spectrograph, plasma jet spectrograph, light spectrograph, electric analytic chemistry, PH meter, electrolytic precipatation, volt ampere, polar spectrograph, etc..

description.zh: 介紹電子陶瓷之原理及應用 訓練學生對電子陶瓷材料性質認識，並進而介紹陶瓷材料基本製程。課程重點在陶瓷粉体製備成形方法，燒結及燒結理論，除加強學生認識傳統陶瓷外，並對電子陶瓷之應用，作有系統的介紹。課程內容將對日常生活常見之介電陶瓷, 壓電陶瓷, 焦電陶瓷, 半導體陶瓷及磁性陶瓷等部分作深入淺出介紹.
description.en: introduction to electronic ceramics In this course, the dielectric ceramics, piezoelectric ceramics, pyroelectric ceramics, semiconducting ceramics and magnetic ceramics will be introduced with their applications

description.zh: 材料表面處理是各種製造工業不可或缺的過程，不論是傳統的工業或現代的高科技產業，表面處理都一直扮演著極重要的角色。本課程主 要是對表面處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括表面處理技術的基本 理論，前處理技術，各種表面處理的方法與相關知識，以及各種表面處理技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Surface coating and chemical surface treatment are the main subjects to be taught in this course. The phase composition of the each coating methods is introduced initially. Association of theses process with chemical pre-treatment of the material surface is reviewed next. Both experimental procedures and techniques base on concepts of electrode reactions and impedances are discussed during the entire presentation of this course.

description.zh: 主要課程內容包括Visual Basic或C程式語言介紹及應用。
description.en: The major course includes the introduction of Visual Basic or C programming language and application.

notes: 限工程學士班二甲以上年級重補修；計網電腦教室限20人

description.zh: 此課程之教學內容包括：概論與儀器使用，字法與線法，應用幾何學，投影幾何學，正投影法則與基本製圖，曲線軟體，機械工作圖及製圖軟体使用。
description.en: The content of this course include the brief introduction and instrument application, The drawing of line, lettering, applied geometry, descriptive geometry, orthography projective rule and fundamental graphics, curve line software, mechanical working drawing, and graphics software application.

description.zh: 工程地質學為地質科學之應用學門之一，本課程之內容在介紹工程地質的一般關念及基本原理，包括工程地質學導論、工程工址調查重點、工程地質中之材料因素、岩體中之弱面、地質作用的動力與岩石之褶皺、工程地質之計量化及其應用、工程地質在自然邊坡穩定之應用、各種自然岩石與土壤之簡介、工程地質在水庫工程之應用、工程地質在壩工之應用、工程地質在隧道工程之應用、工址調查之目的方法與程序、工程地質圖簡介、地質鑽探與現地試驗、工程地質中之環境因素等部份。
description.en: This course of Engineering Geology is designed as an upper-division course for undergraduate geology majors and graduate students, with an emphasis on construction or environmental concerns. Also enrolled are civil engineers with a background in geology and those who are interested in geologic applications to construction. The course builds on a basic knowledge of geology by relating geology to engineering fundamentals and construction concepts. The topics of this course include 1.Origin and development of the earth, 2.Introduction to the Engineering Geology, 3.Elements of Rock and Soil Mechanics, 4.Engineering properties of rocks, 5.The environmental factors of the Engineering Geology, 6.The weak planes in the rock body, 7.The environmental factors of the Engineering Geology, 6.Geologic hazards, 7.The rock mass classification and rating, 8.Landslides, subsidence, and slope stability, 9.Site investigation, 10.Case study in the Engineering Geology

description.zh: 使修習者對於大地工程有基本認識，應用土壤力學理論於工程實務。
description.en: This course introduce the design considerations of some fundamental and simple geotechnical structures based on the application of soil mechanics, with practical exercise. A series of design tasks for slope protection, including retaining wall, cut and drainage, anchors are  requested.

description.zh: 本實習著重在材料的合成法，包含人工晶體及各式無機材料的合成實作。實驗設計皆搭配「材料合成」授課內容，所得之樣品將進一步做表面與結構上的分析。核心實驗計有： (1)固態反應法合成鈦酸鋇粉末 (2)化學氣相沈積法沈積薄膜材料 (3)沉澱法合成磁性氧化鐵粉末 (4)溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽粉末 (5) 溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽薄膜 (6)氧化還原法合成金奈米顆粒 (7) 磷酸二氫銨晶體成長 (8) 物理氣相沈積法沈積金薄膜材料
description.en: The laboratory sections in this course are designed to synthesize various inorganic materials. Eight experiments will be carried out in a semester including: 1. Synthesis of BaTiO3 powders by solid-state reaction 2. Preparation of thin film by chemical vapor deposition 3. Synthesis of magnetic Fe3O4 powders by precipitation reaction 4. Synthesis of SiO2 powders by sol-gel reaction 5. Synthesis of SiO2 thin film by sol-gel reaction 6. Synthesis of Au nanoparticles by oxidation-reduction reaction 7. Crystal growth of NH4H2PO4 8. Preparation of gold thin film by physical vapor deposition.

description.zh: 教育學生瞭解各種寶石鑑定方法與原理，並能加以融會貫通與實際操作，以期充分發揮於各類寶石之鑑定。內容涵蓋：寶石鑑定之要領及方法概論，夾子、放大鏡、尺寸量度、秤重、螢光燈操作，偏光鏡之操作、比重之量測，查氏濾色鏡之使用、折光儀之操作，多色性與二色鏡、分光鏡之鑑定方法，熱導儀、鑽石筆之使用、鑽石之比色，顯微鏡之觀測，以及綜合操作與鑑定等。
description.en: To educate students to understand various gems identification methods and their principle, and can make a comprehensive realization and practical operations. The content contains: method outline, the clip, magnifying glass, measurement of size, the balance, fluorescent light, polarization lens, Specific gravity, color filter, refractometer, dispersion, thermal meter, the observation of the microscope, etc.

description.zh: 本學科對於再生、非再生資源以及資源再生之現象作一整體性的介紹，並配合原理及實例的講授，以期能對於工商業及一般生活的廢棄物或其附帶產生的低價值物料，經由處理而加以回收利用，避免資源的浪費。
description.en: Introduction the recycle of resources.

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在講解現行都市計畫法及相關法令體系的重要內容，同時針對實際案例予以檢討、分析。授課主題涵蓋：1.現行都市計畫法之法令體系、2.我國都市計畫法之發展沿革、3.都市計畫法的條文內容及相關問題、4.土地使用分區管制規則、5.營建法規電腦查詢系統之使用、6.未來都市計畫法修法之方向、7.都市計畫法規施行案例分析。

notes: 四建四、四創意四與進修部二技合開(建築)

description.zh: 1.建築管理行政體系及法源介紹。2.建築管理之對象人、事、物介紹。3.建築許可之申請、審核、核發、列管及追蹤作業。4.建築物之施工管理及工程糾紛處理。5.建築物使用與變更使用之管理。6.建築物昇降設備管理制度介紹。7.建築物違章之查報與拆除。8.建築物公共安全檢查法律依據及作業程序。9.建築管理的發展方向。10.建築師及營造業管理之基本概念及未來之工作方向。
description.en: 1.	Introducing the hierarchical of building department and government administration rules of the building.2.	Introducing administrative terms of building with owner, designer or supervisor of building, construction work, building site, and building itself.3.	Application procedure for a building permit, include application, judgement, approbation, management and audit.4.	Administration for Building construction and construction dispute intermediation.5.	Administration for building occupancy and alterations.6.	Introducing administration of building elevator facilities.7.	Illegal building administration and dismantling.8.	Inspection procedure for building safety and procedure rules.9.	The development direction of building administration.10.	The basic concept and executive direction in the future for administration of Architect and construction.

notes: 四建四與四創意四合開(建築)

description.zh: 本課程首先介紹社區的階層意義及規劃程序及方法，其次舊社區規劃的主要內涵包括土地使用規劃、運輸規劃、公共設施規劃各以理論發展及案例操作說明，尤其是土地使用與運輸規劃之整合及鄰避性公共設施規劃案例之舉證。在就社區規劃後之整體開發方式說明，如何由二度的平面規劃成為三度空間的開發。期中考後將針對更前瞻性及更細緻的規劃技巧作為授課的內容，包括生態社區規劃的方法、災害及防災規劃，並舉科技的發展包括網際網路及捷運之發達對社區規劃的衝擊及因應。最後舉全球化及競爭力對社區發展的影響。另外以本人服務於實務界多年，得由同學指定欲瞭解或探討的課題由教師準備講授，以增加共同討論的意願，冀讓同學能對生活的空間有個全貌的初識。二個學分的課程僅能讓同學對環境有所管窺，希望加上其他的課程，讓同學進而因之他、關懷他、愛他而願意以專業與他結緣終生，那怕我們沒有好的居住環境！
description.en: This course is an introduction on the meaning of community hierarchy, the procedure and methodology of planning, as well as theoretical developments and case studies regarding major planning issues such as land use, transportation, and case studies on NIMBY facilities.Furthermore, I will also demonstrate planned unit developments and how to transform a two-dimensional planning into a three-dimensional development.After the midterm, I'll focus on more foresighted and deliberate planning techniques, including ecological community planning methods, disaster-preventive, planning, and the possible coping measures with respect to the impacts resulting from technological advances such as the internet and the mass transit systems. At the end, I'll also cover topics regarding the impacts of globalization and competition upon community developments.As I have had a lot of empirical experiences from my job, the students are allow to specify some topics or issues for this class so that the students

notes: 四建四、四創意四與進修部二技合開(建築)

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
description.en: This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

notes: 工設三四與創意三四合開

description.zh: 藉由大量的人物寫生，從人性關懷的角度速寫記錄人生百態，速寫重點要「神」、「形」兼備。下一步是靜態單人速寫練習，體態美見於動、靜、張、弛的表現，且比例要正確。下筆速、簡、精、準、是練習重點。接下來是靜態雙人、多人速寫練習。除了依循單人速寫練習要點，並加入空間透視感，使畫面構成更生動有趣。
description.en: The course begins with a lot of figure sketching. You have to care about all walks of life, and actively observe and record their figures. Try to master both the charm and the form of the model.  Next focusing on static mono-figure sketching, you have to demonstrate your techniques in presenting either the static or the dynamic, the state of tension or looseness. You also have to be precise in proportion when you do your sketch. Stress definitely on the practice of speediness, simplicity, accuracy, and preciseness. Also work on static twin-figure and multi-figure sketching. Besides incorporating guidelines from the previous activity, you have to add the sense of spatial perspective to make your sketch more vivid and

notes: 工設二三四與創意三四合開

name.en: Human Computer Interaction on media convergence Platform

description.zh: 本課程將提供學生如何學習整合手持行動裝置以及電腦視覺技術，利用電腦視覺技術，進行影像擷取，並分析影像中所表示之操作指令，並將分析結果轉換為電腦操作指令，已達到人機互動之功效，並整合實現於一套手持行動裝置平台上，除了讓學生可學習電腦視覺技術，也藉由手持行動裝置來實現之途徑，學習到軟硬體整合之經驗。
description.en: The objective of this course is to teach students design methodologies, developing tools, and implementation on media converged platform (handheld devices) for human-computer interaction applications. The topics include: 1. Introduce system development platform and tool-chains on handheld devices. 2. Developing software using opensource GUI and computer vision libraries. 3. Developing Vision-based techniques for intelligent human-computer interaction on handheld devices . 4. Developing augmented reality applications on handheld devices

description.zh: 1.積體電路的分類，2.積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS元件組成各種數位電路，6.以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7.系統分割，8.設計問題之探討，9.IC的構造， 10.設計方法，11.時序問題之探討，12.鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI之測試，14.有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15.專題製作。
description.en: 1.Classification of VLSI circuit 2.Flow of VLSI design 3.VLSI characterization 4.CMOS design methods5.CMOS digital circuit 6.High-level VLSI design7.System partiton 8.Time squence9.Clock10.VLSI testing 11.Special projects

notes: 四資三與電子三甲合開

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務、程式設計有一全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統架構、儲存網路與虛擬化技術， 2. 業務持續運作儲存技術，3. 儲存架構安全與管理 ，4. 雲端排程技術、效能與安全，5.虛擬化資料中心建置-虛擬計算、儲存、網路、桌面與應用，6.雲端服務與管理，7.雲端運算發展概論與企業應用，8.大量資料運算及案例分析，9.Hadoop 與 Mapreduce，10.雲端運算之SaaS架構，11.實習課程與專題計畫。
description.en: This course focuses on information storage management, infrastructure, service management, security, and migration strategy for Cloud computing as well as the practice of cloud application through readings, lectures, and class projects. Course topics include: 1. Storage Networking Technologies and Virtualization, 2. Business Continuity, 3. Storage Security and Management, 4. Cloud Scheduling, Performance and Security, 5. Virtualized Data Center building blocks - Virtual Compute, Storage, Network, Desktop, and Application, 6. Cloud Services and Management, 7. Cloud Computing Overview and Business Application, 8. Big Data Computing and Case Study, 9. Hadoop and Mapreduce, 10. Cloud SaaS, 11. Lab. and Final Project.

description.zh: 網路搜尋已經成為最受歡迎的應用之一. 資訊檢索主要在探討如何有效的在大量文字及多媒體文件中搜尋使用者想要的資訊. 本課程將介紹資訊檢索的基本觀念, 檢索模型, 文字資訊檢索, 檢索結果評估, 索引與搜尋, 以及其他多媒體檢索相關應用
description.en: With the expansion of the World Wide Web (WWW), Web search has become one of the most popular applications. Information retrieval (IR) is a research field that targets at effectively and efficiently searching information in huge amounts of text and multimedia documents. In this course, we will introduce the basic models, text IR, retrieval evaluation, indexing and searching, and applications for IR.Outline:1. Overview of Information Retrieval2. Modeling3. Retrieval Evaluation4. Text IR5. Query Languages and Operations6. Indexing and Searching7. Applications for IR8. Web Search

notes: 資工所、電資國際班與四資四合開

description.zh: Apple推出iPhone以及iPhone SDK 後，造成了一股不可擋的智慧型手機革命，由於相較於桌上型和筆記型電腦，手機是人們日常生活中更容易貼近使用的行動裝置，因此，手機中的App 更可以幫助人們解決生活中的問題。本課程將由最基本的入門點切入，前段會先帶領同學針對Objective-C 語法，委派設計(Delegate)模式等iOS入門的幾大難題上課，接著利用Storyboard建構出常見的iOS app 使用者介面，最後再教導同學用OpenGL es 實作有趣的3D 應用程式。本課程大致如下：1. 導論2. Objective-C3. iOS系統架構4.Xcode開發工具安裝與使用5.基礎UI設計與多國語言6. 核心應用程式設計7. 感應器應用8. 多媒體與相機功能9. OpenGL ES10. 擴增實境11. 專題實作及評鑑
description.en: In this course, you will get hands-on with the Apple SDK and learn how to use Objective-C to build the apps from scratch; You will be equipped to develop iOS apps, including 3D Apps through an understanding of the following course materials:˙Introduction to iOS˙How to program in Objective-C˙Using X-Code ˙The basics UI design of an iPhone/iPad application˙iOS MVC structure˙Use of sensors, the GPS, and cameras˙Multimedia functions – how to play audio and video files˙OpenGL ES for 3D/AR application˙Project Demo and Review˙How to publish an iPhone/iPad application

name.zh: 行動應用軟體開發技術

description.zh: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉開發行動應用軟體所需之各項整合技術。課程內容包括： 1. 行動應用軟體設計概觀  2. Android SDK 與 Eclipse 開發工具  3. iSO SDK 與 Xcode 開發工具  4. 內建裝置應用設計(I)：Accelerometer、振動、Media Player  5. 內建裝置應用設計 (II)：GPS、Map  6. 網路應用設計(I)：Web Service，JSON  7. 網路應用設計 (II)：AJAX，JavaScript，JQuery  8. 資料庫應用設計：SQLite  9. 社群應用軟體開發  10. App Store 應用軟體行銷  11. 行動應用軟體設計趨勢  12. 期末專題製作
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge and practices to develop mobile applications.  This course covers the technical foundations of the mobile application development skills through readings, lectures, and class projects.  Course topics include: 1. Overview  2. Android SDK and Eclipse Development Tools  3. iSO SDK and Xcode Development Tools  4. Media and Camera Application Design：Video、Audio、and Photo APIs  5. Location and Sensors Application Design：GPS、Map APIs  6. Connectivity Application Design(I)：Web Service，JSON  7. Connectivity Application Design (II)：AJAX，JavaScript，JQuery  8. Database Application Design：SQLite  9. Social Application Design  10. App Store and Applications Marketing  11. Mobile Application Development Trend   12. Final Project

notes: 四資四與資工所合開;計網電腦教室，大學部限20人

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討敷地計畫的規劃及設計技術如何應用於實際的操作層面。以敷地計畫的基本內容為單元，介紹各種實際案例並分析其特點。學生透過課堂的討論及實地的調查、分析，來瞭解敷地計畫的實際工作內容並研習各種課題的對策、解決方法，使其具備更豐富的專業知識應用於建築設計的相關領域。
description.en: The course is to explore the practical skills on site planning techniques. The course covers the basic components and their various applications of the site planning. Both advantages and disadvantages of each application are introduced. Through class discussions and field studies, students are able to understand the actual contents and issues of the site planning. The strategies and solutions to the planning problems will be facilitated to help students to get the better professional abilities of related architectural design works.

notes: 建築三與創意三合開(建築)

description.zh: 本課程訓練運用數位科技能力，以進行建築領域中的複雜幾何設計形體的發展、描述、資訊擷取，並透過系統化流程加以合理化，以至建造完成。本課程授課方式為演講及實作並行，課程預期修課者發展出一套有創意的數位構築系統。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in digital technologies for extracting, developing, and analyzing data of complex geometries, while facilitating production of a systematic workflow for rationalization and constructability. The course will be conducted in the forms of lectures and tutorials, and expects students to develop unique and creative systems of digital fabrication.

notes: 建築三與創意三合開(建築)

description.zh: 細部設計之任務是接續基本設計之工作，以較大之比例圖說表達設計者之設計概念，其中包含材料之經驗型知識及其應用。教學上透過理論傳授以及對各種材料之特性體驗、繪製圖說、施作，以達教學目的。
description.en: The task of Detail Design is to extend the design concept of basic design in larger scale. It includes the empirical knowledge of materials and their applications. Through theory delivery and acquaintances of all kind of materials, design drawing    and practice to reach the teaching goal.

notes: 建築三與創意三合開(建築)

description.zh: 訓練學生對室內施工圖樣,施工規範及施工實務之了解.並熟練室內工程之成本分析及數量計算之方法與要點.
description.en: This course will acquaint the student with the techniques of pricing a piece of furniture including materials, labor, overhead, and administrative expenses. To calculate "Break-even" Point, to analyze and control cost elements of manufacturing furniture, with special emphasis on economic utilization of materials, manpower and machines

notes: 工設三與創意三合開(家室組)

description.zh: 基礎室內設計工程圖學訓練。內容包含室內空間三視圖繪製原理，標準符號、線條、尺寸、字型等標示；空間一點、兩點投影透視，以及實例練習。課程主要以手繪為訓練基礎。
description.en: The training of fundamental interior architectural drawing with lectures consists of Three-view drawing and the marking of standardized symbols, lines, dimension and types. It consists also the training of Perspective drawing based on Projection theory. The course emphasizes the practice of hand-drawing techniques.

notes: 工設二與創意二合開(限主修家室組者修課)

description.zh: 經由對環境問題的一般瞭解，研究現有之綠色設計政策、綠色設計管理及綠色生命週期設計。分析研究可行的方案來落實reduce, reuse 及 recycle （3R）三原則於產品設計程序之中。
description.en: A general review of environment issues and their problems followed by studies on green design policy, green design management, life-cycle design. Studies of exploring guidelines that lead to implementation of principles of reduce, reuse and recycle in process of product design.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

name.zh: 使用者經驗設計與評量

description.zh: 本課程將包含使用者經驗設計的基礎，以及使用者研究量測的內涵及方法。本課程中，將透過課堂上課、討論、以及實習的方式，介紹使用者研究的實際案例、評估模式、團隊合作方法、設計與評估工具、實踐思維、挑戰、以及實際執行的程序。預期學生將於本課程中，透過分組獲得使用者經驗在互動設計、空間設計以及產品設計上，有關使用者研究的設計、評估、施行、以及質化與量化分析量測評估的知識與方法。
description.en: This course will cover the fundamentals of user experience design and provide the students with insights into the measurement of user research. The real-life processes, challenges, considerations, tools, team works, models and case studies of user research are introduced in this course by lecturing, discussing and practicing methods. Students are expecting to learn user experience principles, to designing, evaluating, implementing and measuring user experience in both qualitative and quantitative methods in the aspect of interaction design, space design and product design individually.

notes: 103學年入學核心選修課程【停開】

description.zh: 本課程中，學生將探索影視製作所需的技術與創意。課程內容包含視訊的分割安排、錄影、後製、鏡頭運用、角架安排、聲音錄製、編輯、腳本設計、表演、特效、算圖格式介紹、智慧財產權相關法令等。
description.en: Students in this course will explore creative and technical experiences used by professionals in the field of Video Production and Television. Content will include but is not limited to: theory and practices in video segment planning, recording and post-production, camera shots and angles, tripod use, audio recording, editing, storyboarding, performance; special effects, rendering formats and copyright law.

description.zh: 剖析國內外在數位影像裝置的發展現況，以及未來的發展趨勢，並探討復合感官如何結合內在感知而在藝術性上產生的新變數。從未來資訊格式的發展、軟體的演化、媒體內容的整合等角度分析，並透過實測，探討複合影像媒體發展與應用的利基。熟悉After Effects 的應用領域(影視、遊戲的後製特效等)，與潛力，替代拍攝困難或危險度高的鏡頭加上結合3D 軟體製作的動畫加入一些先進的視覺效果。
description.en: Analyze the status of domestic and international developments and future trends in digital imaging installation, and explore how to integrate complex sensory perception and inherent experience in order to develop new variables in the art produced. Discuss from the future development of information formats, the evolution of software, perspective of media content integration, through some creative experiment, explore the benefit in the development and application of digital imaging media.

name.zh: 資訊視覺化設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程將介紹資訊視覺化設計與應用的原理與基礎。課程內容將包括:a)	資訊圖像及數位視覺的深入探討b)	利用電腦程式語言製作分析圖表、空間地圖及介面設計。c)	故事與應用主題的視覺化設計在本課程中，學生將學習如何有效的將資訊轉化為具視覺化美感的圖像，並從不同的案例分析中學會如何評估資訊視覺化設計作品與應用。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the principles and basic of infographic design and application. It consists of following issues:a)	The deep study of information graphics and digital visualizations.b)	The use of computer program language to create charts, maps and user interface.c)	The illustrations design to tell stories and application implementation. In this course, you will learn to create effective and beautiful graphical displays of evidence, and to critically evaluate examples from case studies.

notes: 碩/博士生選修，使用設計館710室【停開】

description.zh: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul Saffo未來思考與趨勢前瞻，有助於讓每一位同學思索未來社會可能轉變得新趨勢和新的需求。無論同學希望學習或專精的技能為何，如何應用 該技能，提前 選擇一個在未來對社會或個人更可能有所助益的方向練習、實作，不斷繼續前進，才能夠將個人的意義進一步投射至未來的社會價值中；如此一來，未 來社會也將會給給予你應有的報酬。未來思考的課程，將師承奇點大學客座教授，同時也是美國史丹佛大學設計學院特聘助理教授 Paul Saffo 的 Forecasting 課程，內容將有 - 現況觀察、趨勢分析、未來事件辯論、未來趨勢矩陣圖、前瞻思考經典賞析（包含文章與電影） 等。
description.en: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul SaffoFuture Studies & Forecasting will be more and more important skill for every young generation students. What will the future look alike? What is the driving forces pushing us from current to the future? How many pace layers of future arrivals?In this class, we will discuss Stanford consulting prof. Paul Saffo’s Future Studies & Forecasting methods, by – Observing current trends, future event debate, Matrices and Axes of Uncertainty, future mindset developing, etc.

notes: 技職所與互動所合開，兩所各限9人

description.zh: 介紹服務設計之理論基礎及技巧工具以了解目前服務設計之發展現況, 並進行服務設計案例研討及實作以培養學生服務設計的知識與實作能力。
description.en: The fundamental theory and application skills of Service Design are to be introduced in this course. In addition, studies of practical cases together with the conduction of a practical service design project are designed to develop students’ abilities to deal with real world issues of service design.

name.zh: 設計研析與創作實務專題(二)
name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(II)

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對設計研究及創作實務相關議題及趨勢有更深入的瞭解。專題內容主要包括1.文化生活設計、2.設計美學、3. 消費文化與設計策略、4.設計行為與創造力、5.以及其他學生有興趣研究的設計研析與實務創作主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding the issues and trends of design research and design practice. Topics are mainly as follows: 1. Cultural Life Design, 2. Design Aesthetics, 3.Consumption Culture and Design Strategy, 4. Design Behavior and Creativity, 5. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

notes: 創新所與進修部在職專班合開(葉老師603、陳老師510)

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的工業設計研究方法的知識及技能架構，課程包括二大部份；第一部份探討工業設計研究計畫的準備及撰擬，第二部份除比較分析主要的工業設計研究方法外，也同時探討其中一種研究方法在工業設計專業領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. It focuses on conducting an industrial design research, collect, and report the data. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream research methodology in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Product Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 21世紀雲端大數據快速運算，與有線無線高速傳輸的「雲通世代」，已帶領人類從工業量產的工業經濟時代，經由知識經濟，體驗經濟，進入了產業服務化，服務產業化，以顧客價值為道向的服務經濟時代。使用者體驗導向設計，與設計思考，己成為今日工業與企業經營教育重要的一環。本課程將以美國史丹佛大學D--School「設計思考」(Design Thinking) 的訓練模式為主軸，輔以左右腦活用的「創造力發展原理」，加上服務經濟時代，「服務設計思考」（Service Design Thinking) 組成本創意與創新思維課程內容。
description.en: In today's could big data calculation and high speed communication Era,  the changing of Social、economic、and technology，Forces human being has to transfer ，from mass production Industrial economic（Hard wear oriented)，trough knowledge economic 、experience economic， to today's customer oriented service economic（Soft wear oriented)。Human Centric Design & design thinking will be one of the key factor for today's industry and management Education。This course will base on the material and approach developed from Stanford D--School，and coop with creative engineering and the service design thinking，to form a Creative & innovation design theory and and project practice program。

notes: 創新所與工設四最後一哩合開限25人

name.zh: 創新講座－產品/服務創新實務(二
name.en: Innovation Lecture - product and service innovation Practice(二)

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產業專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創產品與服務創新策略之實例教學，策劃符合技術發展企業「整合跨領域資源與知識」經營體質，並滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品及服務，使學術與產業互動交流縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course through lectures and conferences with industry experts, will also teach about existing cases of product and service innovation practice. aim to teach about solving the problem of economic development of Taiwan through the way and method of innovation design; and to plan out the “Integration of interdisciplinary resources and knowledge” operating conditions fitting with technology development enterprise and products according needs of markets and users. This course also aims to increase interactivities of academic and industry.

notes: ABC節6週工設二三四年級最後一哩與創新所合開

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(二)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(II)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 1.	營建組織介紹2.	營建工程概述   3.	預算與成本控制與管理   4.	進度控制與管理5.	施工計劃6.	工程發包與估算作業7.	物料與機具管理8.	合約與規範管理9.	安全衛生管理10.	品質管理

Budget and cost control management5.	Planning of construction engineer project6.	Purchase and Estimate 7.	Material and Equipment control management8.	Contract and specification management9.	Safety and sanitation management10.	Quality control management

notes: 四建四與四創意四合開(建築)

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹台灣現行依據都市更新條例相關法令推動都市更新之相關議題，透過理論與案例介紹瞭解台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。

description.zh: 本工程對基礎工程施工時容易產生的隆起、沙湧、上舉、液化、地下室上浮等災害介紹其產生之原因與案例，同時在時間許可下也介紹高層建築中常見的連續壁工程及逆打工程師公中應注意的要點
description.en: This course purpose to illustrate the cause and case for foundation construction failures and disasters, which includes Heaving, Quick Sand, Up-Lift, Liquefaction and Basement UP Lift, etc. If time is allowed, I will extra introduce which important to pay attention items for construction of Slurry Wall Engineering and Up-Down construction Method Engineering which often be used in High-Rise Architecture.

notes: 建築四與創意四合開(建築)/進修部職二建五/進修學院進

description.zh: 本課程教學之目的為使同學了解各系統之設備概要，管線配置及管道空間設計應注意之事項，希望同學具備與專業機、水電技師討論之能力： (1)從空調、電力、給排水、消防運輸…等設備，探討建築物理環境控制系統的特性，了解如何從建築之計劃、設計、施工至使用管理等各階段與建築設備之搭配。(2)探討建築設計於電力、照明、空調、熱水及再生能源…等系統節約能源的做法及其效益課程目標：(1)使學生了解各環境控制系統之內容及其特性，做為創造節能舒適且方便之建築空間之基底。(2)使學生了解各環境控制系統之設備、管線空間大小、配置應注意事項。(3)使學生具有與機、水電專業技師討論之能力。(4)使學生能了解推動綠建築所需之電力、照明、空調、熱水、再生能源設備節能技術。課程期間若有機會將安排實地設備參觀。

description.zh: 本課程主要為介紹與歷史建築與古蹟之保存與再利用相關的觀念、理論、技術與發展概況，授課採講演方式。
description.en: This module introduces primarily the involved concept, theory, technique and the general conditions of its development. Class will be conducted by lecturing.

description.zh: 一、說明環境心理學的意義、發展背景、適用範圍及研究架構，並介紹環境心理學的方法論及在建築規劃設計上之運用；二、針對環境心理學與實質環境相關之重點課題，研討視覺美學、特性使用者活動行為模式、群居型態社交行為、空間場所性能體認等現象與實質設施需求之互動關係，並由實際案例之研討、模擬，以熟悉調查、觀察之操作。

name.en: Regional Methodology on Landscape and Architecture

description.zh: 本課程以地域論述為中心講述有關知識體系的基礎和架構。第一部份涵蓋人文主義地理學、文化地景、以及存在主義及其支系的現象學等基礎；第二部份講授以上述知識論為主的地景和建築詮釋與實踐，包括城市規劃、建築和地景建築理論等範疇的相應，介紹地域論者如Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton等人的觀點。第三部分為以台灣地區地域地景與建築思維的議題導向，進一步充實地域文化的空間-形式的智性思維。
description.en: This course is underpinned upon the epistemology of Regionalism that consisted of three parts. The first part traces back to Humanistic Geography, Cultural Landscape, Existentialism and its philosophical branch line-phenomenology, which are sources of the Regionalism. The second part is centered on interpretation and implementation in either landscape or architecture disciplines, in relation to the perspectives of city planning, architecture, and landscape architecture. And Regionalist advocates like Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton and so on are included. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural Space-From topics are introduced to substantiate intellectual understandings.

notes: 建都所與在職專班合開

name.en: Special Topic of integration and application of Building Information Modeling (BIM)

description.zh: 建築資訊模型(Building Information Modeling)結合了建築設計、施工規劃、機電整合、生態節能以及美學等應用，是未來建築產業趨勢。本課程以BIM平台架構為中心，講述台灣建築產業面臨建築設計、施工、機電等多面向的整合。內容包括概念設計、建築設計、文件紀錄與施工規劃、建築與環境耗能分析以及環境控制等應用整合。藉由探討BIM的內涵、策略與技術，了解BIM在建築設計上的實際應用。並介紹演練REVIT 及ECOTECT兩種BIM軟體。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is an intelligent model-based process that provides insight for creating and managing building and infrastructure projects faster, more economically, and with less environmental impact. This course focus on introducing BIM system which includes a comprehensive portfolio of solutions for design, visualization, simulation, and collaboration that uses the rich information in the intelligent model to inform better decision-making and break down the barriers to better business.

notes: 建都所與在職專班合開

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務、程式設計有一全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統架構、儲存網路與虛擬化技術， 2. 業務持續運作儲存技術，3. 儲存架構安全與管理 ，4. 雲端排程技術、效能與安全，5.虛擬化資料中心建置-虛擬計算、儲存、網路、桌面與應用，6.雲端服務與管理，7.雲端運算發展概論與企業應用，8.大量資料運算及案例分析，9.Hadoop 與 Mapreduce，10.雲端運算之SaaS架構，11.實習課程與專題計畫。
description.en: This course focuses on information storage management, infrastructure, service management, security, and migration strategy for Cloud computing as well as the practice of cloud application through readings, lectures, and class projects. Course topics include: 1. Storage Networking Technologies and Virtualization, 2. Business Continuity, 3. Storage Security and Management, 4. Cloud Scheduling, Performance and Security, 5. Virtualized Data Center building blocks - Virtual Compute, Storage, Network, Desktop, and Application, 6. Cloud Services and Management, 7. Cloud Computing Overview and Business Application, 8. Big Data Computing and Case Study, 9. Hadoop and Mapreduce, 10. Cloud SaaS, 11. Lab. and Final Project.

description.zh: 網路搜尋已經成為最受歡迎的應用之一. 資訊檢索主要在探討如何有效的在大量文字及多媒體文件中搜尋使用者想要的資訊. 本課程將介紹資訊檢索的基本觀念, 檢索模型, 文字資訊檢索, 檢索結果評估, 索引與搜尋, 以及其他多媒體檢索相關應用
description.en: With the expansion of the World Wide Web (WWW), Web search has become one of the most popular applications. Information retrieval (IR) is a research field that targets at effectively and efficiently searching information in huge amounts of text and multimedia documents. In this course, we will introduce the basic models, text IR, retrieval evaluation, indexing and searching, and applications for IR.Outline:1. Overview of Information Retrieval2. Modeling3. Retrieval Evaluation4. Text IR5. Query Languages and Operations6. Indexing and Searching7. Applications for IR8. Web Search

notes: 資工所、電資國際班與四資四合開

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 都市設計是一種整體性、全面性的思考，他包含了對都市內整體全般的活動記其所一存的實質環境安排，同時他也處理既有建成環境的成形及其與自然環境間的關係對應。並思考處身於其間的人們如何在社會與經濟的各種層面做出最適切的回應並具體呈現於空間裡。	故之，一個好的都市設計絕對不僅止於技術上的分析評估，他更關切於人們如何看待環境，如何面對環境思考，如何面對環境思考，與如何參與程式設計的成形。	這個專題將討論什麼是都市設計極其重要性，都市設計在現時處境下所面臨的挑戰，以及我們可以如何藉由都市設計創造一個可為適切的都市環境。
description.en: Urban Design should to be understood to apply to all scales of and types of urban activity and to be concerned about the physical arrangement and functioning of urban activities, the physical appearance of the built environment and its relationship to the natural environment, the way in which people experience it and the social and economic factors which influence its quality.	So achieving good urban design does not require that every decision maker becomes skilled in important design decision know what the people involved in important design decision know what to look for, the questions to ask, and have at least a rough idea of the criteria to consider.	This course will discuss urban design what is it and why is urban design important, what are the challenges, and how to setting our fundamental directions for achieving a more cohesive and satisfying environment.

description.zh: 學習邏輯思考的目的在於幫助我們培養一種邏輯能力，使我們能夠邏輯理性地以語言進行思考。要達成上述目的，我們首先要了解語言做為一種符號的內在邏輯架構。我們要明白什麼是概念、與概念所指涉的對象、與概念具備的意義和觀念；然後，語句的性質，包含其真假值，它們與字詞和概念的關係。之後，如何用語句去建構論證。為了建構論證，我們要學習傳統的歸納法、三段論法、自然演繹法的基本推論規則與自然語言和形式語言之間的翻譯。總之，我們要會在生活中如何理性地思辨問題並有效地與他人溝通。課程講授將配合一些心理測驗、課堂遊戲與電影教學。
description.en: The purpose of learning “Logical Thinking” is to help us acquiring a kind of ability in virtue of which we will be able to think logically and rationally.  To achieve that goal, we need to know the innate logical structure of our language.  That means, we will need first to grasp the essence of concepts including their reference, meaning, and ideas. Then, we shall study the essence of sentences including their truth-value and the relations with words and concepts.  After that, we shall learn how to establish a sound argument. For that purpose, we plan to study induction, syllogism, basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in quantificational logic, and translation between natural and formal language.  In a word, we will be able to speculate problems in our life rationally and communicate with others effectively.   The lecturing of the course will mix with psychological texts, games and practices in the classroom, and scientific films or regular movies.

description.zh: 為培育學生瞭解當前財務金融之實作能力，透過實驗室建置的財金模擬競賽環境，以培養學生建立其財務管理、金融市場與機構、風險管理及公司治理之實務決策能力。進一步訓練學生通過國際與國內相關的財務金融專業證照考試，以期達到理論與實務充份接軌之目標。
description.en: To nurture students to understand the practical skills of the current financial market, through the financial simulation laboratory, students build their decision-making ability of financial management, financial market and institutions, risk management and corporate governance. Further training students to obtain international and domestic financial professional certification exams in order to achieve the goal of seamless integration of theory and practice.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the students with a broad understanding of information systems, information technologies, information systems development and management in business and other organizations.

description.zh: 企業倫理是企業經營本身的倫理，內容可以分為對內和對外兩部份。本課程將介紹：1、企業與員工間的勞資倫理2. 企業與客戶間的客戶倫理3. 企業與同業間的競爭倫理4. 企業與股東間的股東倫理5. 企業與社會間的社會責任6. 企業與政府間的政商倫理
description.en: Business ethics is the intrinsic value of enterprise. It contains two parts, inside and outside enterprise. This course will introduce 1. Ethics between employer and employee2. Ethics between enterprise and client3. Ethics between enterprise and competitor4. Ethics between enterprise and stockholder5. Ethics between enterprise and society6. Ethics between enterprise and government

name.en: Case Study of Corporate Merger & Acquisition

description.zh: 本課程個案研究目標公司包括科技公司與金融機構，可能牽涉之法律有：企業併購法、公司法、證券交易法、金融機構合併法、金融控股公司法、勞動基準法等。 本課程主要內容有1.概括併購政策議題。 2.併購交易的財務結構、會計、評價與法律議題。
description.en: This course covers several topics: 1. General policy issues surrounding mergers and acquisitions. 2. The financial structuring of the deal, accounting issues, valuation, and legal issues.

name.zh: 智慧財產權服務業商業模式
name.en: Business Model of Intellectual Property Service Industry

description.zh: 智慧財產權的應用由於NPE之興起，引起全世界的重視，歐美大公司視為未來重要策略。為了培養本國智慧財產權服務業，本課程將探討國際上近年來興起的智慧財產權各種商業模式，評估其優劣點及台灣可能發展應用之方向。
description.en: The application of intellectual property is a hot topic internationally. Especially, the rising of NPE litigation or other legal practices. In order to bring up the service industry of intellectual property in Taiwan. This course will emphasize the business model of intellectual property service industry worldwide. Comparison and application between Taiwan and other countries will be addressed.

name.zh: 時間序列分析與製程控制
name.en: Time Series Analysis and Process Adjustment

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於教導學生如何利用時間序列分析、品質製程管制、工程製程控制等方法來達成先進製程控制的目的。課程講述之內容包含下列課題:製程監控、製程調整、離散動態製程、時間序列模型、轉換方程模型、最佳回饋控制器、指數加權移動平均控制、遞迴式估計與自適應控制等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students a modern treatment of discrete-time advanced process control (APC) methods based on time series analysis, statistical process control (SPC) and engineering process control (EPC) for Quality Engineering in manufacturing. The topics that will be addressed in this course include:(1)	Process Monitoring; (2)	Process Adjustment;(3)	Discrete-Time Dynamical Processes; (4)	ARIMA Time Series Models; (5)	Transfer Function Modeling; (6)	Optimal Feedback Controllers; (7)	EWMA Control; (8)	Recursive Estimation and Adaptive Control.

description.zh: 本課程引入生活性的學習方法來誘發學生學習動機，並培養可在社會與職場運用的四項英文基本技能。課程目標在幫助學生在生活實境習得英文，為他們裝備可溝通表達於日常、社交活動，並提升職涯的整合性英文技能。每堂課程都注重在以學生為中心的學習活動中帶入全真、應用性高的英文技巧。課程設計涵蓋的功能包括課堂分享與作業、日常互動英文以及專業英文練習。主要課題包括溝通，簡報與談判技巧，應用閱讀與寫作，聽力技巧運用，語言與文化。
description.en: This course introduces real-world based learning approaches for students to raise their learning aspirations and to develop four essential English skills that are applicable in social and professional encounters. This course aims to help students practice English in most real-life settings and to equip them with integrated skills to advance their careers. Every class session focuses on bringing authentic and applied English in student-centered leaning activities. The class design covers the functions like information sharing and task-based activities, social interactions, and professional English practices. Essential topics include communication, techniques of negotiation and presentation, applied reading and writing, strategies for developing listening skills and language learning across cultures.

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高等應用統計的相關原理方法與應用案例，包括一般資料分析、迴歸分析、時間序列分析、類別資料分析、樞紐分析、抽樣調查等。課程將配合個案進行討論。
description.en: This course is mainly to learn some advanced methods of statistics and their application in business. The topics include general data analysis, regression, time series analysis, category data analysis, pivot analysis and sampling investment. The course contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in applied statistics practice.

description.zh: 本課程為一理論與操作兼具之課程，目的為培養修課學生對於故事力之應用，尤其是於文化與創意產業方面。課程中將以媒體之生態與相關產業作為重心，輔以國際案例與趨勢，探討文化與創意如何展現，以及轉化為產業之關鍵為何。透過敘事分析，學生可以了解文化之脈絡為何延伸與擴散，以利用課堂教學、專題演講與部分實作演練，培養學生人文、產業、創意乃至於科技應用之跨領域思考能力，並為下學期人文與數位之實務應用實習奠下基礎。
description.en: The aim of the course, which is conducted with theories and practices, is to lead the students to comprehend the application of storytelling, especially in the cultural and creative industry. We will focus on the ecosystem of media with related industries, and the international cases or trends will also be introduced during the class, on the purpose for investigating that how the culture and creativity were exhibited and converted into industries. During the class, seminar and the practices, the students will understand how the sequence of culture extending and spreading. The ability of interdisciplinary thinking for humanism, industries, creativity and the application of technology of students will cultivated, and they will be ready to the practical course for interdisciplinary application of humanism and digital technology next semester.

description.zh: 人類在遠古時代，就有採集或遊耕的遷徙行動。旅行依其目的可分成宗教、商業、軍事、教育、研究與觀光休憩等種類。但是具近代意義的旅行與近代社會制度、交通建設、生活文化息息相關。其中教育、調查研究與觀光等尤其是近代旅行文化與過去最大之差異，本課程介紹近代旅行的開始、近代旅行性質與景點的變遷，並展望未來旅遊文化的發展。
description.en: Far from ancient times, humans traveled for various purposes like religion, commerce, military, education, studies, and expedition. In recent years, the motives and meanings of travel have changed; people leave their home under the influence and needs of social systems, transportation industry, living cultures, and particularly education, research, and tourism. This course aims at  giving an overview of the travel culture in modern times, dealing with issues such as changing attraction spots, positive and negative impacts on our societies, and how the scale and importance of travel will evolve in the future.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋數位時代中一手檔案史料的整理與數位化過程，著重檔案資料的典藏管理與加值應用。課程目標在於培養學生的檔案智能，包括：1. 認識檔案資料類型與特性，以及數位保存的相關概念；2. 理解檔案編排分類與描述著錄等資訊組織的基本原則3. 具備檔案資料查找、評估與運用數位典藏等檔案專業素養。
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concepts and practical issues in modern archives administration. And then, focus on the long-term preservation and open access of digital archives. By attending the class students will: (1) Understand basic concepts of archival materials relating to digital preservation. (2) Gain in-deep understanding the principles of archives arrangement and information organization. (3) Possess the archival intelligence to find, evaluate and use the digital information.

description.zh: 1.廣告一定要花大錢嗎？那可不一定！我們一起找出不花大錢，又能廣而告知的好方法吧!2.讓學生了解各類型的廣告方式，不是只學美工而已。3.國內外各類別優良廣告觀摩後進行創意引導與實作4.每一小組就是一公司，我們從CI,LOGO和品牌故事開始做廣告
description.en: 1.Understand the various types of advertising methods, more than art design.2.Every team is a company, you should design the logo and brand story with brain storming. Through practical case studies, finding the way to sell creative.3.Watching and doing, learning more about advertising tools and use them.

description.zh: 課程目標:透過歐、美、日及台灣傑出攝影家之專題攝影作品賞析，結合實務創作與討論。培養學生對於專題影像的認識及從事專題攝影創作之職能。課程內容:專題攝影概述、專題攝影作品賞析、實務創作與討論。作品賞析與討論將試圖含括地方誌型專題、人類學及社會學式專題、戰爭與事件紀錄專題、城市專題、地景式專題、編導式專題、廢墟專題，歐美近代及當代攝影家系列、東北亞漢字圈國家 (台灣、中國大陸、日本、韓國) 近代及當代攝影家系列等討論。惟需視學生創作進度適時調整。教學方式:各類型專題攝影作品、經典攝影集及影片賞析、課堂講授、作品創作與討論。
description.en: This course will combine the practical creation with discussion, and students can appreciate the photography from some distinguished photographers who are from Europe, the United States, Japan and Taiwan. Moreover, students will be trained to know the thematic image, and to engage in the creative photography.

description.zh: 課程主要為探討插畫意涵與設計相關表現形式。透過對物象的觀察，開發創作與設計的資源。練習插畫技法（色鉛筆，水彩，壓克力，拼貼，與軟體組合），並結合現代設計理念，發展創新的文創設計風格。熟悉媒材的表現方式與技巧，並能實驗於文創設計中。
description.en: This course mainly explores the illustrator implications associated with the design manifestations. Through observe the images, the learner can develop the creative and design resources. The learner can exercise the illustration techniques (color pencil, watercolor, acrylic, collage, and software combination); combine with modern design, the development of innovative cultural and creative design. At last, the learner will be familiar to the illustrator expressions and skills in order to develop a new experiment in cultural and creative design.

name.en: Skills and Practicum of Escorting English

description.zh: 本課程提供在各種場合中口譯的應用。如伴隨工廠參觀，出席展覽會場，開幕演說，及外賓接待，採取密集的口語演練，並訓練隨行解說的技巧。
description.en: This course provides an application of Interpretation for different occasions. These situations include a factory visit, an exhibition presentation, an opening address, a foreign-visitors reception and a banquet attendance. This course aims to build up the techniques and cultivation of Escort Interpretation through intensive oral training.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 本課程以逐步口譯為主﹐深入模擬商務訪談﹐會議溝通﹐外賓接待至國際會議主持﹐隨行口譯﹐各式談判之概論與實例解說。課程注重模擬﹐演練及禮儀文化的涵養，以期訓練學生語言應對的能力及良好風度的表現。
description.en: This course focuses on Consecutive Interpretation. It simulates a commercial meeting and communication, visitors reception, international conference hosting and escort interpretation. In addition, it includes a general theory of different negotiations and examples. The course concentrates on simulation, practicum and courtesy cultivation. We expect to build up students' dialogue ability and manners.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（二）

description.zh: 本課程目的在啟發學生英語聽力，分析及思辨能力。本課程自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的新聞及媒體教材, 以訓練聽力及筆記的技巧。 此外，在課堂上將討論一些有爭議性的或者有趣的議題，以培養學生獨立思辨能力。
description.en: The course aims to develop the student's techniques of listening, analyzing and critical thinking in English. A variety of journalistic and media texts will be selected from newspapers, magazines and T.V. to reinforce listening training and note-taking skills. Besides, some controversial or interesting issues will be discussed in class to encourage the student's independent and critical thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
