name.zh: 高階英文字彙習得與應用
name.en: The Acquisition and Application of Advanced English Lexical Use

description.zh: 此課程旨在協助學生建立相當於美國大學入學測驗的高階字彙，亦即相當於接受高等教育之英語系國家人士所具備的用字能力。此課程將通過故事方式介紹此類字彙，其中也包括字形學之解析。學生修習此課程後應能將高階字彙使用於正確的上下文中，因此可達成下列諸目的："	提昇高階字彙數量"	加強英文閱讀能力"	習得重要字源解析"	避免上下文中的用字錯誤"	提高英語表達能力"	加強英文寫作能力"	精進英語文溝通技巧
description.en: This course aims to help students build a more powerful vocabulary on the SAT (the qualifying exam for US college admission) level, i.e. the level of proficiency of an educated native speaker's. Students will be introduced to the lexical use through story scenes. Morphological analysis of the words will be included in the course. At the exit of this course, students are expected to use them in their proper contexts and hence reach the following goals:"	Develop a powerful vocabulary"	Improve reading skills"	Learn important word roots"	Avoid word usage error in context"	Become a better speaker"	Strengthen his/her writing ability"	Improve communication skills

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies. Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

description.zh: 本科目以跨學科多媒體的方式來探討不同媒介(與文類)的作品之間如何存在著啟發創意的連鎖反應，與創意激盪的引力關係，並探索何以同一時代不同的藝術形式之間展現出類似的創意主題與手法，進而形成時代的文化特色。以荷蘭畫家維米爾(Vermeer)的名畫「戴珍珠耳環的少女」為例，此畫作激發了作家歇維理(Chevalier)無限的想像空間而寫了一部同名小說，試圖去解釋畫作背後之奧秘。接著，受小說的激發，一部同名電影應運而生，把小說情節加以改編，並參考維米爾其它畫作, 試圖重現原畫創作時畫家個人、家庭與時代風采。這一連串連鎖激盪之下，不同媒介與文類的新作品出爐了，各有特色，而且彼此間還有相互連結和彼此評論的關係。有時候，類似的連結(可能在主題或手法上)普遍地出現在同一時代不同的藝術形式之間，這說明了此一連鎖與創意激盪的關係如何大規模地造成文化思想潮流與大眾流行文化。以「解構(後結構)思潮」為例，原本在哲學領域獨樹一格，進入文學批評理論領域後成為顯學，進而影響藝術評論與創作理念。後來更傳播至建築理論與設計，造成「解構建築」之流行與歪斜屋宇之誕生。儼然成為「後現代文化」的註冊商標。這一文化傳播的現象乃依賴前述之(1)啟發創意的連鎖反應，
description.en: This course adopts an interdisciplinary and inter-medium approach to understanding the cultural creation of a text.  The target is to investigate how a cultural/literary text is created in relation to, and in response to, another text in different media/genres, and how this "chain reaction" or "web of influences" displays a rippling effect that travels across the boundaries among painting, music, architecture, literature, and film.  For example, Vermeer's painting entitled "The Girl with a Pearl Earring" inspires the creation of a novel by Tracy Chevalier, which in turn facilitates the creation of a movie also with the same title. The case is the same with the musical piece of "Gloomy Sunday" which inspires the creation of many verbal/visual/audio art forms under the same title and even makes a social impact on increasing suicide cases.  These related texts form a "constellation" of "cycle," and certain ideas are so powerful that they permeate many genres/media at the same period of ti

description.zh: 本課程廣泛介紹社會語言學的各個次領域，目的在引導學生瞭解此領域早期的基礎研究與現代的關注議題。學生可藉此認識英語在社會上的運用以及各種社會變因對於語言運作的影響。修完本課程後，學生有能力辨認現代英語的不同語體、解釋語言使用所牽涉到的社會因素、運用社會語言學中適切的研究方法完成語言研究，並能將社會語言學的概念應用到語言教學。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive overview of sociolinguistic subcategories with the goal of introducing students to both early foundational work and current issues in this field. It provides students with valuable knowledge in the use of the English language in society and the effects of intricate social variables on language operation. Upon completion of this course, students will be able to identify the social varieties of English spoken in the present world, to explain the social factors involved in language use, to use appropriate methodology in sociolinguistics to conduct linguistic research, and to apply sociolinguistic knowledge to language teaching.

name.zh: 譯學新趨勢與翻譯實踐
name.en: New Trends in Translation Studies and Translation Practice

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹20世紀90年代之後翻譯研究興起的「全球化轉向」與「社會學轉向」兩大新趨勢，並深入探討其對翻譯實踐與譯者專業素養所可能帶來的啟示。課程欲含括之翻譯議題如下：（1）全球化轉向-全球化與本土化張力、跨文化溝通、文化認同、權力關係、譯者中介、科技與翻譯、翻譯商品化、非專業翻譯；（2）社會學轉向-翻譯的社會因素（如社會制約與機制）、譯者的社會層面（如譯者角色、慣習與網絡）、翻譯過程的社會學研究（如品質管控、編修與團隊翻譯）。除論文之研讀外，亦將透過翻譯實例的分析（包括新聞、字幕、旅遊、廣告、網頁、商業與文學翻譯等實例），讓學生明瞭這些新趨勢如何引導翻譯實踐，並使其重新省思譯者的專業素養。此外，英漢/漢英翻譯實作與譯評亦為授課重點，期藉此協助學生與時並進，構思適切的翻譯策略。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the "globalization turn" and "sociological turn" in translation studies after the 1990s. An exploration will also be made into their possible implications for translation practice and the translator's qualifications. Translation issues to be addressed may include the following: (1) the globalization turn - the tension between globalization and localization, cross-cultural communication, cultural identity, power relations, the translator's mediation, technology and translation, the commoditization of translation services and non-professional translation (such as fansubbing and scanlation); (2) the sociological turn - socio factors of translation (e.g. social constraints and mechanisms), social aspects of the translator's profession (e.g. the translator's role, habitus and network), and the sociology of the translating process (e.g. quality control, revision and team translation). Through concrete examples of authentic translations, this course will enable s

description.zh: 本課程之宗旨在於讓學生全盤瞭解現代化空間資訊、掌握空間資訊自動化研究方向、提供專業擴展及實力培養、並開創研究和就業格局。課程內容包含：一、空間資訊簡介、二、航測及遙測概要、三、地理資訊系統概要、四、全球定位系統簡介、五、數碼城市簡介。
description.en: The objective of this course is multi-fold. First of all, it offers an unique opportunity to obtain comprehensive understanding about modern geoinformatics. In this course, students will be able to gain insights into the state-of-the-art research, development, and applications in geoinformatics, especially the 3S technologies (RS, GIS, GPS) and their integrations for sophisticated applications such as cyber city implementation and applications. For engineering students, this course is also an effective platform for capacity-building and career extending. The main topics of this course include: 1) Introduction (geoinformatics at a glance), 2) Remote Sensing (remote sensing fundamentals, airborne remote sensing, and satellite remote sensing), 3) Geographic Information Systems (GIS), 4) Global Positioning System (GPS), 5) Cyber City Implementation and Applications.

notes: 土木三甲乙、四甲乙合開

description.zh: 課程內容包含：(1)緒論、(2)運輸系統規劃、(3)公路工程概述、(4)交通工程概述、(5)鐵路工程概述、(6)航空工程概述、(7)港灣工程概述。
description.en: Integrated transportation systems from the standpoint of assembly,haul,and distribution means.Analysis of transportequipment and traveled way.Power requirements,speed, stopping,capacity,economics,route location.Future technological developments and innovations.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生七大項方向1.複習矩陣學2.結構矩陣學基本概念3.勁度法觀念4.勁度法解桁架問題5.勁度法解梁問題6.勁度法解剛架問題7.程式分析實習
description.en: The course contents are divided into 7 major topics: 1. Review the matrix theory; 2.Basic concepts of the matrix structural theory; 3. Stiffness method; 4. Using stiffness method to solve truss problem; 5. Using stiffness method to solve beam problem; 6. Using stiffness method to solve rigid frame problem; 7. Practice of the structural analysis program.

notes: 土木三甲乙、四甲乙合開

description.zh: 本課旨在介紹各種基礎工程施工。課程摘要可分：(1)概說、(2)基礎種類、(3)基礎之支承力、(4)支承力試驗、(5)基礎開挖、(6)直接基礎、(7)樁基概說、製造、打擊之法、(8)場樁施工、穩定液泥水管理、(9)反循環鑽掘工法、(10)貝諾特工法、(11)土鑽工法、(12)預壘樁、(13)深基礎工法、(14)開口沈箱、(15)地下連續壁、(16)地錨、(17)地下構造物、(18)水平方向推進工法、(19)托底工法。
description.en: With the knowledge of Soil Mechanics and Foundation Engineering, a series of underground construction methods will be elaborated. They are slurry diaphragm wall,pile foundation (reverse,or cased),anchor system, foundation excavation,drainage system,bracing system and monitoring system etc.

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1)地質調查、(2)岩石之風化及其性質、(3)地下探查、(4)地球物理探測、(5)邊坡滑動與山坡、(6)建築物、結構物之基礎、(7)公路與鐵路、(8)隧道、(9)壩址地質調查。
description.en: Fundamentals of mineralogy,petrology,sedimentation,stratigraphy,and structural geology needed by environmental scientists to understant earth materials.

description.zh: 土木營造工程範圍廣泛，各種法營造工法更是不計其數，本課程教授學生幾種常見之施工法：一、土方工程：1.土壤調查2.挖方3.填方4.搬運5.軟弱地盤之處理6.土方作業計劃7.作業能力估算。二、混凝土工程：1.混凝土材料及其性質2.配比設計3.混凝土之攪料、灌置與搗實4.混凝土之養護與品質控制。三、基礎工程：1.基礎之種類2.淺基礎3.樁基礎4.沈箱5.深開挖及擋土工程6.圍堰7.灌漿。四、專項工程：1.河川工程2.海岸工程3.堰埧工程4.發電工程5.隊道工程6.橋梁工程7.港灣工程8.道路工程9.衛生下水道工程10. 鐵路工程11. 地下構造物工程12. 建築工程13. 機場工程。
description.en: public work,improving the land and the enviorment,and preventing the harricoms.Construction Methods includes elementary and applied methods.The purposes of this course are for students understanding the steps of various construction methods.

description.zh: 1.結構之彎曲行為 2.幾何非線性問題介紹 3.彎矩再分配 4.非彈性結構分析 5.塑性分析 6.韌性設計特別要求 7.鋼筋混凝土梁之彎曲行為 8.結構在返覆荷重下之行為
description.en: The behavior of nonlinear structure1 Bending in structure2 Introduction to geometrical-nonlinear problem3 Moment-redistribution 4 Non-elastics structure analysis5 Plasticity analysis6 Flexibility design special request7 The bending of the reinforced concrete in beam

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 引介混凝土材料微巨觀性質、力學行為與新設計觀念。
description.en: (1)Basic Material Porperties-An Overview.(2)Coment Hydration and Microstructure.(3)Concrete Strength Development.(4)Creep and Shrinkage of Plain and Structural Concrete.(5)Durabiltiy.(6)High-Temmperature Effent:Design of Fire Resistance of    Concrete Structural Members.(7)Very Low Temperature Effects:Design of Concrete Vessels    for Cryogenic Liquids.(8)Linear Elastic Fracture Mechanics:tress Approach and    Energy Approach.(9)Special Type of Concrete Materials(High Performance    Concrete).(10)Micromecanics of Fibrous Composites-Elastic Modules and    Stress-Strain Relation Tensile Strength of Fiber    Reinforced Reinforced Composites.

name.en: Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering Slope Stabilization

description.zh: 生態工法的概念和原則近年來廣泛地引介和應用在各種的土木工程領域中，包括河溪、坡地、都市和交通建設等，而由於土石流和坡地災害的頻繁發生，因此在山坡地應用生態工法遂成為重要的課題，也逐漸成為應該提供給土木系學生，使其瞭解相關基礎知識的重要課程，因此在本導論課程中，我們將介紹如何將生物地工技術和土壤生物工程（Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering）應用在邊坡穩定和侵蝕控制上，使學生認識並瞭解目前在邊坡保護上結合工程力學分析、植物學知識和實際案例應用的發展，並藉此介紹國內外常用的邊坡穩定工法，以及結合不同傳統擋土設施的可行方式。本課程無先修課程限制，建議研究所和大學部高年級同學選修。
description.en: The concept and principles of ecological engineering has been widely adopted by various disciplines of traditional civil engineering,including hydraulic engineering, slope stabilization, urban infrastructures, and transportation engineering.  Among them, slope stabilization is a particularly important topic because of thefrequent occurrence of debris flows and landslides in Taiwan, and thus it becomes necessary to provide such a course to familiarize students with this important field.  In this introductory course, we will explain the fundamental concepts of biotechnical and soil bioengineering and how to apply them to the slope stabilization anderosion control.  An interdisciplinary approach that combines the knowledge and understanding of both mechanical design and vegetation properties will be emphasized.  The results can be integrated with traditional retaining structures to create more economical and eco-friendly slope stabilization systems.  No prerequisite.

description.zh: 衛星影像為目前土木、水資源與防災科技所經常使用之資訊來源，其處理有別於一般之影像，主要內容將包含衛星影像幾何校正、影像分類、影像增揚、數值高程運用等。
description.en: Satellite images are one of the major information sources in civil engineering, water resources engineering and disaster prevention technologies.  Satellite image processing is different from picture image processing, mainly focusing on the satellite image geometric rectification, image classification, image enhancement, digital elevation model applications, and so forth.

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 資料庫是任何完整的資訊管理系統之不可或缺的一部份，並且已經在各行各業中顯示其與日俱增的重要性，當然土木工程也不例外。尤其近年來地理資訊系統、營建管理系統及地質鑽孔資料庫的發展，更促使土木工程師正視資料庫的重要性，並學習如何有效地管理龐大的相關資訊。因此，本課程的設計即針對此需要來教導學生熟悉現代資料庫系統的設計與技術，以使他們在畢業後更具有競爭力，更容易找到理想的工作。課程的內容將包括資料處理、概念設計、關連式資料模型、及正規化等領域，而學生必須在學期中設計並完成一個完整的資料庫作為專題計畫。關於本課程的其他細節請見下述課程大綱。
description.en: Database (DB) is an integral part of any information management system, and has been playing a significant role in many academic programs and professions, including the civil engineering, construction engineering, and environmental engineering. In recent years, the development of Geographical Information System, Construction Decision Support System, and Geotechnical Data Bank all require practicing civil engineers to understand the principles of underlying data storage and to develop an effective style of data management to achieve competitiveness in the market place. Therefore, it is the focus of this course to guide the students to become familiar with various technical aspects of modern DB systems so that they can perform the above-mentioned tasks and become more employable. This course will cover areas such as data processing, conceptual DB design, relational data model, and normalization. The students are required to complete a semester project and implement a functional DB.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 認識科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

name.en: The Software of Electrical Design Automation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生熟悉自動化設計軟體之環境，方法及設計原則，（如高階語言程式設計及電腦輔助電路設計自動化軟體），內容包含（1）VB程式語言介紹 （2）VB之自動化設計領域之應用 （3）spice與pspice電腦輔助電路設計軟體之介紹及應用  （4）電路佈局自動化設計軟體之介紹及應用  （5）期末專題
description.en: This course is let students to familiarize the environments, methodologies and design principle of automation design software ( High level programming language and the automation software of computer-aid circuit design). They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Introduction and application for computer-aid circuit design software(spice & pspice). 4. Introduction and application for design automatic software of circuit layout. 5. Final project.

description.zh: 簡介，人工智慧語言介紹及工業應用，專家系統。
description.en: Introduction, Artificial Intelligence, programing language and its industrial application, expert system.

name.zh: 嵌入式即時多工核心開發與應用
name.en: The Development and Application of Embedded Multitasking Real-time Kernel

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式即時多工核心，瞭解其架構，並學習嵌入式即時多工核心之設計與相關應用技術。內容包含：(1)嵌入式系統介紹，(2)即時多工系統觀念介紹，(3)即時多工核心運作方式，(4)工作管理，(5)時間管理，(6)記憶體管理，(7)事件管理，(8)於嵌入式系統建制即時多工核心。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded multitasking real-time kernel.  They will parse the structure of multitasking real-time kernel; learn the skill to design the embedded multitasking real-time kernel and the application technology.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded system introduction, (2)Multitasking real-time concept, (3)Kernel structure, (4)Task management, (5) Time management, (6)Memory management, (7) Event management, (8)Real-Time kernel porting.

description.zh: 單自由度系統的自由及強制振動，多自由度統的自由及強制振動，自然頻率的計算與模態分析，連續體的振動，振動的控制，振動系統之數值分析方法，非線性振動及隨機振動
description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

notes: 車輛所與碩士在職專班合開

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 一、電腦網路概述二、Internet三、TANET BBS四、Gopher五、Unix介紹六、Unix指令七、Mail八、Ftp九、News、WWW十、Novell Netware
description.en: 1.TANet BBS2.NCSA Telnet3.UNIX Concepts, Commands4.Mail, News5.Ptp, Archie6.other Internet resources7.Network hardware8.Drivers, Network protocol9.LAN10.Dial up service

notes: 電機三甲乙丙合開，計網電腦教室，限50人

description.zh: 以國外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 1. 離散時間訊號與Z-轉換2. 取樣原理3. 離散傅式轉換與快速傅式轉換4. 數位濾波器系統設計5. 同位訊號處理6. 時變訊號處理-短時域傅式轉換7. 離散時間隨機程序8. 離訊與訊號估測
description.en: 1. Discrete-time signal and Z-transform 2. Sampling theorem 3. Discrete Fourier Transformer(DFT) and Fast Fourier Transformer(FFT) 4. Digital Filter Design5. Homomorphic Signal Processing 6. Time-varying signal Processing-short-term Fourier transformer 7. Discrete-time Random Process8. Noise and Signal

name.en: The Architecture and the Urban Microclimate

description.zh: 納入「都市微氣候」的考量，是現階段精進建築設計與提升建築效能的關鍵手段之一；回饋在生活舒適度的感受、居住安全度的維護以及省能節電度的落實等面相，都可得到具體且顯著的成效。掌握都市微氣候的特徵型態與變化脈動，擬判對建築安排可能肇致的影響及干擾，透過自然循環的流場機制及量場管制，找到本土建築規劃之最佳改善設計策略。
description.en: Bringing the “Urban Microclimate” into consideration is one of the key methods to enhance architectural design and upgrade building effectiveness at the present time; it can get feedbacks in many aspects such as feelings of cozy life, maintenance of residential safety , and to carry out the energy-saving.  Holding the features and changes of the Urban Microclimate, analyzing the potential affect and disturb for architecture, through the control mechanism of natural circulation in order to find the best strategy for local design enhancement.

description.zh: 材料科學為工程教育的重要科技，材料的性質與特性，為現代工程設計中佔有相當重要的地位，金屬材料的各種性質，都基於其內部構造的變化，其內部原子聚集成規則的結晶構造，亦或聚集成非結晶構造，其所形成的各種物理特性，由最基本的結晶構造開始了解。電子顯微鏡，破壞力學，超導性，電傳導，超塑性，動態回復，動態時效應變。差排理論、結晶核的形成與成長，合金相理論，晶界自由度，鑄造物的成核與均質化，硬化現象，固體擴散現象，破壞現象及理論，潛變的形成與原因等，充分了解金屬材料特性上的理論基礎與變化軌跡。
description.en: Properties and characteristics of materials play important role in modern engineering design.Each property of materials is based on its transformation at inner structure, its atoms inside converge either a regulated crystal structure or a noncrystal structure, their physical property should be understood from the most fundamental crystalline structure, such as electronic microscope, destructive dynamics, super-conductivity, electronic conductivity, super-plasticity, dynamic recovery, dynamic aging strain , dislocation theory, the formation and growth of nucleus, alloy phase theory, degree of freedom of crystal boundary , nucleation and homogenization of casting product, hardening phenomenon, solid diffusion phenomenon, destructive phenomenon and theory, creep formation and its reason, all of these make student fully understand the theory basis and change record of the metallic material characteristics.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: (1) 探討比較技職教育的意義、發展與研究方法。(2) 介紹主要國家的技職教育制度。(3) 從事比較技職教育問題的分析。
description.en: (1) Examination of concepts, development and research methodology of comparative technical-vocational education.(2) Knowledge in comparison technical-vocational education in Chinese in terms of purpose system and problems with those of selected foreign countries.(3) Analysis of major research regarding contemporary trends and issues in comparative technical-vocational education.

description.zh: 本課程由ERP概論談起，介紹完整的ERP架構及涵蓋的模組，以及企業規劃及導入ERP的過程，最後結合案例介紹、並探討從ERP到企業的e化等主題，期許同學完成本課程後能了解並運用ERP。
description.en: This course begins with a brief introduction of ERP, followed by a comprehensive discussion on the system architecture, functions, and modules of ERP. Also covered in the course is the process of planning and introducing ERP in enterprises. Real-world cases of ERP and e-Business will be provided in the course.

notes: 科技大樓240電腦教室【停開】

description.zh: 軟體在其整個生命週期中要維持「健康」，必須要能確保需求做對(Right)、品質做好(Good)、以及使用上可被依恃 (Dependable)。在軟體工程領域中，軟體生命週期管理(Software Lifecycle Management, SLM)是確保軟體健康的具體作法。本課程將涵蓋軟體昇命週期管理的主要議題、實務作法、與工具，並以案例具體說明。1	軟體的生命週期2	軟體生命週期管理的挑戰3	軟體生命週期管理實務作法4	軟體生命週期管理平台與工具5	軟體生命週期管理案例
description.en: To ensure that software stays healthy through its lifetime, the development team must work to guarantee that the requirements are correctly implemented, that software quality is good, and that the software product is dependable in its use. Software lifecycle management seeks to bring forward such guarantees. In this course, the main issues, challenges, best practices, tool supports, and some illuminating case studies are covered.1	Software lifecycle management2	Challenges of software lifecycle management3	Best practices for software lifecycle management4	Platforms and tool supports for software lifecycle           management5	Case studies

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式， Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Fourier Series 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling 2.Frequcy response of discrete time system 3.IIR digital filter design 4.FIR digital filter design 5.Discrete Fourier transform 6.Fast Fourier transform

notes: 電資國際專班與資工所合開

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，包括一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。以提升實驗效率及品質。
description.en: This course aim to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor experiment, two-factor experiment, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

notes: 資源所與在職專班合開【停開】

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 選習本課程應具有普化及一般有機化學知識，此課程主要講授環境上（尤其是應用在工程上）有關的有機化學專業知識，其主要內容包括：１.有機物種與特性２.有機物之基本化學反應３.有毒（害）有機物之處理原理４.環境有機物之代謝與循環機制５.環境荷爾蒙之化性６.微量有機物之採樣分析原理
description.en: Based on general chemistry, the course provides professional knowledge on the organic chemistry in the environment. It includes the following major items：1.Characteristics and classification of organics.2.Fundamentals of chemical reaction for organics.3.Mechanics of cycling and metabolism of organics in the environment.4.Chemical properties of environmental Hollomans5.Theory of treatment for hazardous organics.6.Principle of sampling and analysis for micro-organics in the environment.

notes: 與資源所陳老師合開(教室:億光大樓13樓1343研討室)

description.zh: 本課程著重在協助企業如何在國際間綠色浪潮的衝擊與永續發展三重盈餘之二十一世紀新經濟中競存，並能與全球永續發展的理想共存共榮。換言之，本課程主要是協助企業如何透過環境的議題，將原本可能的威脅課程轉換成機會。課程內容包括：企業環境管理與永續發展的內涵、企業環境風險管理與預防、整合性企業環境管理的做法、綠色行銷與永續消費、綠色產品設計、環境會計、環境資訊的揭露與報告、企業社會責任的內涵及做法，以及其他企業綠化的做法。
description.en: This course focuses on strategically assisting enterprises to improve their competitiveness through environmental issues while striving for sustainability in the 21st century. The contents of the course will be covering overview of corporate environmental management and sustainable development, corporate environmental risk management and prevention, green accounting, green marking and sustainable consumption, corporate social responsibility, corporate environmental disclosure and reporting, and some other subjects related to the greening of the business.

description.zh: 本課程內容乃在引導學習者了解環境保護之實務範疇，以環境污染類別(空氣、水、廢棄物、土壤及地下水、毒物學等領域)及職場工作屬性(工程師、專案規劃、研究人員、公務人員、教育推廣等)不同面向來介紹。課程中將安排各環境領域專業人員進行其實務工作性質講解，並規劃至產業界、公家機關、學術研究及其他單位進行實務參訪，俾使學生了解環境保護不同工作特性現況及其所需具備的內涵，並熟悉職場組織特性，拓展視野，以充實進入社會所需具備之技能。
description.en: This course will introduce practical work of environmental protection, including different aspects of environmental quality and relative job descriptions. Lectures and discussions with respect to professional persons from industry, consulting business, research institute, government and social association will be arranged. Student’s more understanding about skills and abilities needed in the real work of environmental protection is anticipated.

description.zh: 工程最佳化方法導論,線性規劃法,非線性規劃法,多目標函數最佳化,近代數學規劃法介紹,精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering optimization concepts,Linear progrsmming methods, Nonlinear programming Methods, Multi-objective optimization, Introduction to Modern mathematical programming techniques,Optimum design of precision machine components and systems.

notes: 英語授課 綜科B05-1上課

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

notes: 博士班(前十二週與碩班合上,後六週碩博分開上)

name.zh: 車輛電力轉換系統實驗

description.zh: 本課程內容包含應用於車輛電能轉換系統的轉換器工作原理以及實驗平台建立。此外，針對新能源與車輛電力整合，本課程探討燃料電池、光伏電池、超級電容器以及先進電力電子轉換器與電動機驅動技術於車輛電力系統應用。而車輛電力系統中直流和交流配電架構的合理設計準則，也一併討論及分析。最後，針對電動車輛與智慧微電網系統整合的科技潮流，未來電動車電力系統將需要設計Vehicle-to-Grid(V2G)協助穩定電網或Vehicle-to-House(V2H)成為家用不斷電裝置系統。因此，本課程擬講授各種新型電力轉換器及電池充電器，並將其區分為隔離型/非隔離型、單向/雙向電力潮流特性之轉換器及其設計實例。
description.en: The contents of this course explore the operation principles and experimental bench setup of different converter topologies for vehicle electric conversion systems. Also, the course discuss new clean energies such as fuel cells, photovoltaic cells, super-capacitors integrated with advanced power electronic converters, and motor drive technology for the vehicle electric conversion applications. DC and AC power distribution architecture of the vehicle electric conversion system also be discussed and analyzed. Finally, corresponding to the trends of electric vehicles integrated smart micro-grid system technology; the electric vehicle power system needs the Vehicle-to-Grid (V2G) function to stabilize the grid or Vehicle-to-House (V2H) function used for household uninterruptible power device system applications. Therefore, this course will teach a variety of new power converters and battery charger with classifications of isolated / non-isolated, unidirectional / bidirectional power flow fe

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 碩士班畢業門檻，限碩士班學生修習

description.zh: 課程內容包高等控制策略，多變數控制系統，數位取樣，數位控制系統，模式識別，狀態變數。
description.en: An introduction to advanced control algorithms, multivariable process control, digital sampling, digital control system, model identifications, state variable.

description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties.

description.zh: 本課程著重於教授現代有機合成方法、反應機構、及其應用等知識，並幫助學生了解有機化學與生物化學、藥學等領域之相關性，進而拓展到將來學術及工業上的研究與應用。
description.en: This course focuses the contemporary developments in the study of the structure of carbon compounds and the mechanism of their reactions. Selected topics such as natural product, heterocyclic compound, stereochemistry, aromaticity, reaction intermediates, peptides synthesis and photochemistry will be included.

notes: 化工所必修、生化所選修(化工生化合開)

description.zh: 本課程將教授質譜、紅外線光譜、核磁共振光譜及紫外線光譜等所提供的互補資料來鑑定有機化合物的結構。除了光譜的解釋之外，也會教授基本的分析原理。
description.en: This course will teach students how to identify the structures of organic compounds from the complementary information afforded by the types of spectra: mass, infrared (IR), nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and ultraviolet (UV). The course is not only to teach students to interpret spectra, but also to present basic theoretical concepts.

description.zh: 本課程講解有關生產設備投資低，雖量少，但附加價值高之精細化學品，如各種界面活性劑，添加劑，促進劑，催化劑，助劑，香料，顏料，醫藥等。並引例介紹這些化學品製程，用途，運用原理，國內外特用化學品之現況與發展。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicinals, etc.  Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discusses in this course.

description.zh: 本課程講解有關生產設備投資低，雖量少，但附加價值高之精細化學品，如各種界面活性劑，添加劑，促進劑，催化劑，助劑，香料，顏料，醫藥等。並引例介紹這些化學品製程，用途，運用原理，國內外特用化學品之現況與發展。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicinals, etc.  Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discusses in this course.

description.zh: 「生命科學與工程」課程融合生物與工程兩門學科，內容涵蓋生命科學領域（分子、細胞、組織、器官、系統、個體、行為等）及工程領域（化學、化工、材料、電子、電機、機械、土木等，以及影像、量測、模式等方法）。授課內容盡量以引發學生興趣為主，目的在使工程領域的學生能明白生命科學對工程設計的影響，以及使生物領域的學生能瞭解工程對於生命科學的幫助；兩者相輔相成，相互影響。
description.en: This course is designed for undergraduate engineering students with the objective of introducing the fundamentals of life sciences while pointing out the areas in which engineering plays a pivotal role in the advent. Students are to be provided with perspectives on the interplay between biology, engineering, and biotechnology, with emphasis on the quantitative and integrative nature of biological and bioengineering problems. The contributions of engineering to life science are illustrated with the design and manufacturing of tools essential for observations and applications in medicine, agriculture and environment.

description.zh: 所謂再生醫學主要是利用健康細胞來製作具有功能與生命性之身體器官組織，用於修復或是替換身體內，因為老化、生病、受損所造成之不健康的器官與組織。其次，亦可以其他的方式，例如利用體內藥物釋放等方式來刺激體內組織或是器官再生之方法。其所涉及的領域廣泛至所有之醫療方式。內容將主要以幹細胞與組織工程學為基礎，因應臨床醫療需要為導向，結合材料工程、細胞生物學以及基因工程等科學探討此一應用科學。本課程內容將以深入淺出方式討論醫療相關的尖端技術及未來發展之趨勢。同時，結合幹細胞、組織工程與再生醫學之基本概念知識介紹許多再生醫療相關生技產品。
description.en: Regenerative medicine refers to the use of healthy cells to produce the functioning of the organs or tissues, and repair or replaces the aged and damaged organs or tissues. In addition, it can also be applied directly to in vivo models, for example, to stimulate the tissue or organ regeneration by drug release. Regenerative medicines cover a wide range of medical care. In this course, we will mainly focus on stem cells and tissue engineering based on clinical needs –oriented, we combine materials engineering, cell biology, genetic engineering and other related knowledge explore this issue. Meanwhile, the course will also introduce the knowledge of stem cells, the basic concepts of tissue engineering and many regenerative medical-related biotechnology products.

notes: 化工三甲乙丙合開,初選人數上限30人

description.zh: 本課程目標為提升學生英文之閱讀能力與聽力。包含增加英文單字數量，科技論文文法、句型、結構等特質，及訓練聽力習慣。
description.en: This course aims to enhance the English language skills for engineering students who are preparing for their career advancement in the industry field or business enterprise. The study includes English reading, listening, speaking, writing, comprehension, grammar rules, vocabulary enlargement, pronunciation, conversation, business communication, and professional presentation skills. Oral English speaking will be primary used in the class with interactive mode. The course materials will utilize multiple resources: Cambridge University textbooks, videos, audios, power point, handouts, business reports, newspaper articles, magazines, and English learning websites.

notes: 化工三甲乙丙合開,初選人數上限30人【停開】

description.zh: 介紹高分子物理、化學及光電等性質，並且回顧及展望高分子在生化、醫學及光電產業的應用。1. 高分子物理及化學性質2. 高分子光電特性3. 功能性高分子4. 液晶高分子5. 薄膜技術與應用6. 生醫材料及高分子藥物7. 高分子導體及半導體8. 光電用高分子9. 高分子電池10. 高分子LED
description.en: The course introduces the fundamental principles and applications of polymers. It covers the following topics: physical and chemical properties; electrical and optical characterizations; functional polymers; liquid crystalline polymers; membranes; biomaterials; polymers for photonic and electronics; conductive and semi-conductive polymers; polymers for batteries; and polymeric LED.

notes: 化工三甲乙丙合開,初選人數上限30人

description.zh: 依藥理作用上之分類，介紹其名稱( 包括處方常用名稱) ，化學結構，性狀，合成方法，藥物代謝( 吸收，循環路徑及作用器官或組織) ，藥理反應，適合之醫療症狀使用劑量，中毒及解毒劑，配合禁忌等。
description.en: This course describes the classification of the medicinesincluding their trade names, or those generally prescribed; the chemical structure and their related characteristics; methodology of sythesis and preparation; fate of drugs (involving absorption, circulation and their target organs or tissues); pharmacological aspects; method of indications; intoxication and detoxication as well as their incompatability.

notes: 化工三甲乙丙合開,初選人數上限30人

description.zh: 有機化合物的製備、分離、純化及鑑定。實驗技術加強重點在減壓蒸餾、液相色層分析、光譜分析（IR、NMR、UV）及惰性環境的反應。
description.en: Preparation, isolation , purification and identification of organic compounds techniques such as vacuum distillation, liquid chromatography, spectroscopic analysis, and inert atmosphere conditions are emphasized.

description.zh: 由於石油短缺、汙染嚴重，乾淨的綠色能源發展，一直是全世界亟需努力的目標。本課程將針對太陽能電池、水分解等綠色能源作介紹，讓學生更了解世界於綠能的發展與趨勢，進而激發其願意提出想法投身相關產業的動機。本課程也將訓練學生查資料上台報告的能力，加深其對綠色能源的認知。
description.en: Due to the shortage of gasoline and serious pollutions, the development of the green energy is the most important issue for the whole world. This course will introduce the solar cells, water splitting systems, and other green energies. The main goal is to help students understand the development and direction of the green energies in the world, and further inspire their motivation to join the related industries. This course will also train students the ability to search and report, and further to learn more about the green energies.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

name.en: Special Topics on Geographic Information System

description.zh: 本課程重點在訓練學生如何學習使用地理資訊系統的軟硬體設備，作為空間規劃與設計決策支援的工具。內容涵蓋相關理論及實務，範圍包括：一、	地理資訊系統的定義與發展二、	地理資訊系統的架構與功能三、地理資訊系統在空間規劃與設計上之應用四、地理資訊系統相關軟體之操作五、實務應用
description.en: The course designed is to help students to utilize the GIS environments to produce a better decision-making when dealing with space planning and design issues. Both related theories and applications of GIS are introduced.  The content of the course include:1.The definition and development of GIS2.The mainframe and functions of GIS3.The applications on space planning and design of GIS4.The introduction and operation of GIS software5. Applications practice.

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解生產的物品或提供的服務能適時適地，並以最少的成本送到顧客手中。本課程之內容如下：  1.物流管理和策略  2.運輸和配送  3.保管與包裝  4.定單處理  5.採        購  6.物料搬運  7.物流成本  8.物流服務  9.資訊系統10.物流生產力衡量
description.en: The aim of the course is to help the students understand how to perform logistics activities so as to make products and services available to customers at the time place,and in the condition and from desired in the most profitable or cost-effective way.The content of the course discription:  1.Transpor totion  2.Inventory maintenance  3.Order processing   4.Purchasing   5.Warehousing & packaging  6.Materials handling  7.Logistics costs  8.Logistics customer serrice  9.productivity meajurement

description.zh: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul Saffo未來思考與趨勢前瞻，有助於讓每一位同學思索未來社會可能轉變得新趨勢和新的需求。無論同學希望學習或專精的技能為何，如何應用 該技能，提前 選擇一個在未來對社會或個人更可能有所助益的方向練習、實作，不斷繼續前進，才能夠將個人的意義進一步投射至未來的社會價值中；如此一來，未來社會也將會給予你應有的報酬。未來思考的課程，將師承奇點大學客座教授，同時也是美國史丹佛大學設計學院特聘助理教授 Paul Saffo 的 Forecasting 課程，內容將有 - 現況觀察、趨勢分析、未來事件辯論、未來趨勢矩陣圖、前瞻思考經典賞析（包含文章與電影） 等。
description.en: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul SaffoFuture Studies & Forecasting will be more and more important skill for every young generation students. What will the future look alike? What is the driving forces pushing us from current to the future? How many pace layers of future arrivals?In this class, we will discuss Stanford consulting prof. Paul Saffo’s Future Studies & Forecasting methods, by – Observing current trends, future event debate, Matrices and Axes of Uncertainty, future mindset developing, etc.

notes: 博碩課程, 與互動所合開

description.zh: 本課程係探討纖維製品在非衣著終端領域之應用，例如電子電機，土木，材料，生醫，航空與車輛工程等之應用。其內容包括功能性與機能性纖維、複合紗、複合織物、編帶、非織物、纖維系複合材料與電線電纜、光纖電纜等之製造方法、原理與其終端應用領域。最後將討論微細加工技術與微細粉末在纖維與高科技工業上之應用。
description.en: The course is to interpret the application of the non-apparel textiles at the different end uses, such as application in electrical and electronic, civil, material, biomedical, aerospace, and vehicle engineering etc.  It includes fabrication methods, principles, and end application fields of the performance and functional fibers, composite yarns, composite fabrics, braid, nonwoven, textile composites, and cables and optical cables etc.　Finally, the micro processing technology and powder in textile and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程針對紡織產業創新技術議題與實務操作，安排演講及工廠參訪實習，邀請跨領域之企業講師進行紡織工業技術演講，包括機能性纖維研發與應用、環保染整助劑、功能性織物、高強力纖維織物及塑膠回收再生製品開發等相關創新技術進行講演。除了課程中安排學生到相關紡織產業工廠實地見習。
description.en: The course is to introduce the trends and the characteristics of textile industries in the new millennium. This course will invite well-known entrepreneurs and experts to share their success stories and new technology with the students.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹細胞培養與基因工程之方法與應用。課程內容涵蓋微生物、植物、昆蟲及動物細胞之介紹，細胞生長與代謝，細胞培養方法，生物反應器，基因工程技術與應用實例。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to introduce the technology of cell culture and genetic engineering. The topics include: (1) introduction of microbial, plant, insect, and mammalian cells (2) cell metabolism and growth (3) cultivation of cells in bioreactors (4) fundamentals of genetic engineering (5) application examples.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹微生物及其應用，學生將可習得何謂微生物，微生物如何運作，以及微生物的應用。課程內容包括: (1)微生物的分類、型態、結構及一般特性; (2)微生物的生長與控制; (3)微生物的生理與代謝; (4)微生物的應用，例如生物轉換、一次及二次代謝產物的生產、基因重組蛋白的生產、核酸藥物的生產等。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the major concepts, principles and applications of microbiology. Students will learn about what microorganisms are, how they function, and their industrial applications. The course include the following topics: (1) Classification and structures; (2) Microbial growth and control; (3) Microbial physiology and metabolism; (4) Applications, such as biotransformation, production of primary and secondary metabolites, production of recombinant proteins, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要著重於讓學生瞭解在日常生活中，食衣住行育樂等活動與化學之相互關係。尤其對在生活中所接觸之食品、衣著、環境與用品應有所認識，並以化學觀點了解其與人體之關係。此課程主要內容包括(1)食品化學(Food Chemistry)，(2)衣著化學 (Cloth Chemistry)，(3)環境化學(Environmental Chemistry)，(4)核化學(Nuclear Chemistry)，(5)水化學 (Hydrochemistry)，(6)界面化學 (Interface Chemistry)，(7)家庭用化學品 (Household Chemicals)，(8)化粧品學(Cosmetic Chemistry)，(9)電化學 (Electrochemistry)
description.en: This course focuses on chemistry related to People`s Livelihood, including: Food Chemistry, Cloth Chemistry, Environmental Chemistry, Nuclear Chemistry, Hydrochemistry, Interface Chemistry, Household Chemicals, Cosmetic Chemistry, and Electrochemistry. Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of People`s Livelihood chemicals are also discussed in this course.

name.zh: 綠色化學與潔淨技術特論
name.en: Special Topics on Green Chemistry and Clean Technology

description.zh: 目前永續發展已被視為推動社會和諧、經濟發展和環境保護的共同目標，化學科技則居中扮演一個非常關鍵的角色，因此，這門課程的主要目的是介紹綠色化學與潔淨技術的設計、開發和評估，其中包括：非傳統原料的利用、有利於生態的合成方法、設計更安全的化工產品以及生物合成和生物模擬原理的使用，並從原材料的選擇以至終端產物之整個生產流程，做一完整的評估以了解對人員安全健康以及生態的影響，並與對應的傳統製程相互比較。
description.en: Sustainable development is now accepted as a necessary goal for achieving societal, economic and environmental objectives. Within this chemistry has a vital role to play. Therefore, this course aims to introduce the students to the design, development, and evaluation processes of new Green Chemistry methodologies, and it include: alternative feedstocks, environmentally benign synthetic methodologies, designing safer chemical products, new reaction conditions, alternative solvents and catalyst development, and the use of biosynthesis and biomimetic principles. The students are introduced to the new evaluation process that encompasses the health and environmental impact of a synthetic pathway from choice of starting materials through to target molecule. Furthermore, comparisons and contrasts with classical methodologies are offered as illustrative examples in this course, too.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
description.en: The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 1. fundamental metallographic concepts.2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.3. Hardenability 4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以數個實例說明生產製造的方法，從一個新產品開發到設計安排及製作生產設備，一系之過程解決方法，讓同學了解一個產品的開發、製程的安排生產設備的改善、及其他相關事務的配合等問題。以達到同學到工廠能有系統的解決生產製造問題。
description.en: Required courses before taking this course must be permitted by the professor who teaches this course. There will be examples to illustrate and describe the production methods. Starting from the development of a new product, the course will introduce all process and solution ways of design , manufacture and production, so that the students are able to understand the development of products and their arrangement of manufacture and production equipment. It is our expectation that all graduated students who have taken this course are able to handle the related techniques in industries.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機器人簡介、齊次轉換矩陣、運動方程式及反運動方程式、軌跡規劃、機器人動力學、機器人控制系統、機器人程式語言、機器人於工業界之應用技術。
description.en: Introduction to Robotic Manipulators, Homogeneous Transformations, Kinematic Equations and Solutions, Trajectory Planning, Dynamics and Control of Robots, Programming and Applications.

notes: 機械四甲乙丙合開 一般教室 綜科327 限24人

name.zh: 塑膠射出模具CAE模流分析
name.en: Mold-flow analysis of plastic injection mold CAE

description.zh: (1) 瞭解CAE網格概念與建構，將以國內開發的模流分析軟體Moldex-3D作為教學實       習的內容：(2)流動分析，即熔膠充填狀態；(3)保壓分析，分析模內壓力分佈狀態；(4)       冷卻分析，關於模內溫度分佈；(5)翹曲分析，分析成形品的變形。
description.en: (1) To realize mesh concept and construct the mesh. (2) Flow analysis of melt plastic filling. (3) Packing analysis of pressure distribution in the mold. (4) Cooling analysis of temperature distribution in the mold. (5) Warp analysis of injection molding parts.

notes: 四機三乙與最後一哩合開，限30人綜科328-1

name.zh: 塑膠射出成形與模具實務
name.en: Plastic injection molding and mold practices

description.zh: (1)塑膠材料種類、特性、及其應用；(2)塑膠的成形方法；(3)塑膠射出成形品設計；(4)   射出成形機的分類與規格；(5)射出成形模具的機構；(6)射出成形模具零件規格與選用；  (7)成形品的缺陷與對策。
description.en: (1) Plastic materials types, characteristics, and applications. (2) Forming methods of plastic materials. (3) Part design of injection molding. (4) Classification and specification of injection molding machine. (5) Mechanism of injection mold. (6) Injection mold's parts and part selection. (7) Defects and strategy.

notes: 機械三乙與最後一哩合開，限50人

description.zh: 先修課程: 負責教授同意。本課程目的在介紹蓬勃發展中的微機電系統(micro-electro-mechanical systems, MEMS)工程與最新應用。其內容包括 : MEMS之概念與特性、微觀設計原則、跨領域模擬分析、加工材料分類、主要製程技術介紹、CMOS-MEMS整合製造、封裝與測試技術、微感測器與微致動器、智慧型元件與SOC、工程應用實例介紹
description.en: The course contents include concept and characteristics of MEMS, principles of micro system design, inter-disciplinary simulation and analysis, materials for MEMS, main-stream MEMS processing technologies, CMOS-MEMS process integration, package and test techniques, micro sensors and actuators, smart devices and SOC, and closure with a number of engineering applications.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。生物力學基礎，基本應用力學與生物力學之異同，生物力學之靜力學原理與應用，生物力學之運動學原理與應用，生物力學之動力學原理與應用，生物力學之材料力學原理與應用。
description.en: Principles and Applications of Statics in Biomechanics, Principles and Applications of Kinematics in Biomechanics, Principles and Applications of Dynamics in Biomechanics, Principles and Applications of Mechanics of Material in Biomechanics.

notes: 機械三甲乙丙合開；限30人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程主要介紹幾何光學與Coherent光學兩部份之基本概念與應用﹐提供機械領域的學生有關光的知識﹐讓機械領域的學生有能力加入機光電技術整合。本課程首先介紹幾何光學﹐幾何光學雖然簡單﹐卻是光學應用最普遍的知識﹐接著進入Coherent光學原理與應用介紹﹐Coherent光學在光量測技術部份佔了非常重要的地位﹐透過本課程的訓練﹐學生將可更順利的進入光學實驗室工作﹐當然﹐本課程也適合其他對光學有興趣的學生來修習。
description.en: The lectures in this course include two main parts, the geometrical and the coherent optics. Due to the future high technology, the optomechatronics, needs the cooperation of knowledge among the optics, the electrics, and the mechanics. This course gives the students of mechanical engineering the chance to participate in this work group. The lecture will first show the students the geometrical optics which is simple but important in the field of optical application. The coherent optics is the main part in this course which occupies the most optical technique of measurement. After the course the students should have the enough knowledge to work in the optical laboratory. Certainly, this course is also useful for all students who are interest in the area of the optics.

description.zh: 先修課程：機動學(機構學)、計算機(電腦)程式語言概論、機構運動分析(位置、速度及加速度分析的解析法)、連桿組傳遞角與機械利益的分析、凸輪機構運動分析、壓力角與曲率半徑的分析、齒輪組動力傳遞分析、機構的電腦模擬、機構個案分析。
description.en: Introduction, Kinematic analysis of mechanism(Analysis of Displacement, Velocity and Acceleration by Analytical method), Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage of Linkage, Kinematic Analysis, Pressure angle and Profile's Curvature of Cam, Power Flow Analysis of Gear Trains, Computer Simulation of Mechanisms, and Case Study of Mechanism.

notes: 機械三甲乙丙合開 限25人

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 先修課程: 負責教授同意。1.數位影像基礎，2.空間域影像強化，3.頻域影像強化，4.影像還原，5彩色影像處理，6形態學影像處理，7.影像分割，8. 影像壓縮，9.機器視覺系統。
description.en: 1. Fundamental digital image, 2. Image enhancement in the spatial domain, 3. Image enhancement in the frequency domain, 4. Image restoration, 5. Color image processing, 6. Morphological image processing, 7. Image segmentation, 8. Image compression. 9. Machine vision system.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之Pro/E 3D CAD繪圖能力。課程內容包含：Pro/E基本操作、實體與曲面之設計、曲線之設計、特徵之建立及零件之編輯、曲面及曲線之編輯、Pro/E造型設計、Pro/E工程製圖。
description.en: This course is to enhance the student’s capacity of Pro/E 3D CAD drawing. The course contents including: Pro/E basic operation, solid and curve surface design, establish the characteristics and edit the part, edit the curve surface and curve line, Pro/E modeling design, Pro/E engineering drawing.

notes: 限四機一乙預選，不開放外班選課，限40人綜科328-1

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意.類神經網路介紹: 演算法,應用,與程式技巧，類神經網路控制器設計與模擬，模糊集合,近似推理理論,模糊邏輯控制器介紹，模糊邏輯控制器設計與模擬，基因演算法介紹，以基因演算法最佳化控制器，智慧型控制應用。
description.en: 1.Introduction to neural network: algorithms, applications, programming techniques. 2. Design and simulation of neural network controller3. Introduction to fuzzy set, approximate reasoning, fuzzy logic controller4. Design and simulation of fuzzy logic controller5. Introduction to genetic algorithm6. Optimization of controller by genetic algorithm7. Applications of intelligent controller

name.zh: 醫療器材開發數位化工程
name.en: Digital technology on medical device development

description.zh: 本課程目的在使學生了解醫療器材數位化發展趨勢，課程中透過介紹牙科及骨科等相關領域之應用。結合醫學資訊與3D 影像處理進行產品設計與創新製造工程，也是學習之重點。
description.en: Course purpose:To describe how to use 3D image information in medical device field, To use direct manufacturing technology in medical treatment, To know the current industrial trend.

description.zh: 先修課程：動態分析與模擬或負責教授同意。  非線性系統現象介紹，參數影響及應用模擬方法，數值分析及案例研究。
description.en: Nonlinear phenomena, Effects of parameters, Simulations and analyses, Case study.

notes: 機電所、製科所與自動化所合開【停開】

description.zh: 本課程介紹許多有關於組織中的個人、團隊與組織交互作用的研究。明確地說，本課程內容主要在探討如何改善員工績效與利社會行為，降低缺勤與離職率，以及提高工作滿足與組織承諾等員工態度。
description.en: This course introduces a variety of researches that investigates the interactions between individuals, groups, and organization. Specifically, it focuses on how to improve employee performance and prosocial behaviors, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and enhance job attitudes such as job satisfaction and organizational commitment.

description.zh: 本課程主要運用最佳化方法解析動態成長、風險檢測、供應鏈調控等管理與決策問題，探討的主題包括：環球供應鏈問題、投資組合問題、生產規劃、配送規劃、排程規劃等。
description.en: This course mainly talks about how to use optimization methods to analyze the management and decision making problems such as dynamic growth, risk evaluation, and supply chain adjustment etc. The topics to be discussed include: 1.global supply chain management; 2.portfolio selection problems; 3.production planning; 4.distribution and transportation planning; 5.scheduling problems.

description.zh: 本課程利用要徑法教導學生管理一項專案有關時間及成本的估計，進度表，預算編列等技巧，及其它監督控制一項專案進行之措施。專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。課程內容包含：（1）專案的定義和辨認，（2）專案可行性研究和選擇條件，（3）專案進度表編排，（4）專案之預算與成本控制，（5）限制性資源之編排與調配，（6）專案評核與檢討技巧。
description.en: This course introduces the technique of Critical Path Method (CPM) to manage a project in terms of time / cost estimation, scheduling, budgeting, and other control / monitoring measures on the performance of a project. The role of project manager in an organization will also be discussed. Topics to be covered are: (1) Concept and identification of a project, (2) Project feasibility study and selection criteria, (3) Project scheduling, (4) Budgeting and cost control, (5) Constrained resource scheduling and leveling, and (6) Project evaluation and review technique.

name.zh: 企業經營效率模型分析

description.zh: 企業經營效率評估為管理控制之必要程序，經由績效評估可以建立有效的回饋系統，進而改善各項目之資源使用情況。本課程介紹如何以資料包絡分析進行績效評估的概念及方法，並提供合法完整版自由軟體供學生實地操作，本課程強調理論與實作並重，使學生熟悉DEA理論，並以電腦套裝軟體的實際運算，探討各種實證研究上的應用。
description.en: The study of performance management aids in motivation, employee development and productivity improvement to meet organization goals. This course includes an overview of how performance works to align with the strategic goals of an organization. Specifically, DEA models are used to conduct a sophisticated analysis of the productivity and efficiency, and to show how data analysis forms the information base for compensation and performance appraisal processes. As we study the analytical techniques we shall also examine a wide variety of empirical applications.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討服務科學之各項議題，包含服務科學導論、服務相關政策及法律、服務科技、服務經濟、服務設計、服務工程、服務科學個案等。
description.en: This course is to investigate several key issues on service science, such as introduction to service science, service policy and law, IT application in service, service economy, service design, service engineering, service science cases.

name.zh: 營運模式與供應鏈管理
name.en: Business Model and Supply Chain Management

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對營運模式與供應鏈管理作探討, 其中包含: 1.電子化企業概論2.經營模式3.企業再造4.企業資源管理5.中小企業電子化6.商業電子化7.供應鏈管理8.需求鏈管理9.協同預測管理10.個案研究。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to discuss the business model and supply chain management. The contents of this course will include: 1. General concept of e-business management 2.The business model3. Business reengineering 4.Enterprise resource planning 5.Small enterprise e-business management6. Channel e-business 7.Supply chain management 8.Demand chain management9.Collaborative.

description.zh: 本課程能讓學生了解各種產業相關個案研究。個案涵蓋國內外企業案例。資料來源包含哈佛大學個案、光華基金會個案、及其他相關發表之個案資料。本課程希望學生能透過此案例討論以瞭解產品實務之營運。
description.en: This course will cover the case study related to the management of all industries. The cases will be from international and local enterprise. The teaching material will be from Harvard University case, KMCC case, and other public case. The purpose this course is to provide students a practical indusyries’ scenario.

notes: 經管三、經管四與經管所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要了解行銷研究的本質與特性，掌握行銷研究要領，進而具備規劃與執行行銷研究的能力，包含下列：行銷研究的環境與基本觀念，網路資料庫介紹，資料蒐集模式與方法，問卷設計與抽樣，量表製作，資料分析，研究成果呈現與溝通。
description.en: This course aims to help participants understand the nature and features of marketing research, realize how to conduct marketing research, and develop a toolset for the planning and implementation of marketing research. It has the followings: Background of Marketing Research, Introduction to Marketing Research, Database and Data Collection: Types and Methods, Measurement Instruments and Sampling, Data Analysis, Communicating with Research Users.

name.zh: 雲端軟體即服務系統開發與設計實
name.en: Practice of SaaS Application Development and Design

description.zh: 本課程旨在培育雲端SaaS系統開發與設計人才，訓練學生應用ICE平台進行軟體服務的開發與實做。課程內容含蓋了：軟體產業論述、軟體需求工程、軟體設計、資料導向系統設計、文件管理系統設計、報表管理系統設計、雲端資料轉移策略及雲端行動策略等議題。本課程理論與實務並重、實務案例研討及實務操作練習也將為本課程重要之一環。
description.en: This course intends to introduce essential topics regarding to software application as service (SaaS). The students are trained to design and implement mobile applications via ICE platform. There are several topics, including: software industry introduction, requirements engineering, software design data-driven application, document management application, report management application, data migration in cloud and the mobile solution (& strategy) in cloud. This course focuses on both theoretical and practical issues. Real world case study and hands-on practice will also be important parts of this course.

notes: 資財所與最後一哩合開限40人，科技大樓240電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

description.zh: 1.光的電磁理論回顧2.光學系統光束追跡3.高斯光學4.共振腔理論5. 原子輻射6.雷射振盪與放大7.雷射種類與應用
description.en: 1.Review of Electromagnetic Theory2.Ray Tracing in Optical System3.Gaussian Beams in Optical Media4.Optical Resonator and Cavity Theory5.Atomic Radiation6.Laser Oscillation, Amplification, and Excitation7.Laser Characteristics, Category, and Applications

notes: 四光四與光電所合開，億光1115會議室上課

name.en: Introduction to RFID and its application

description.zh: Radio frequency identification (RFID)是一種先進的自動辨識技術。它用於辨別、追蹤、排序和確認各式各樣的物件，包含有人、汽車、包裹、動物和貨物等等。相關的應用如門禁管理、車輛辨識、資產追蹤、存貨控制、動物晶片和工產自動畫。RFID依靠標籤和讀取器之間無線電波的頻率、電波，來進行辨別。本課程將介紹RFID之基本原理及其生活與產業上之應用。
description.en: Radio frequency identification, or RFID, is a generic term for technologies that use radio waves to automatically identify individual items. There are several methods of identifying objects using RFID, but the most common is to store a serial number that identifies a product, and perhaps other information, on a microchip that is attached to an antenna. In this course, the basic technology of RFID and its application will be introduced.

name.en: Introduction to RFID and its application

description.zh: Radio frequency identification (RFID)是一種先進的自動辨識技術。它用於辨別、追蹤、排序和確認各式各樣的物件，包含有人、汽車、包裹、動物和貨物等等。相關的應用如門禁管理、車輛辨識、資產追蹤、存貨控制、動物晶片和工產自動畫。RFID依靠標籤和讀取器之間無線電波的頻率、電波，來進行辨別。本課程將介紹RFID之基本原理及其生活與產業上之應用。
description.en: Radio frequency identification, or RFID, is a generic term for technologies that use radio waves to automatically identify individual items. There are several methods of identifying objects using RFID, but the most common is to store a serial number that identifies a product, and perhaps other information, on a microchip that is attached to an antenna. In this course, the basic technology of RFID and its application will be introduced.

description.zh: 模具工程不只要讓初學者熟悉模具的設計，而且要讓有經驗的模具設計者也能夠以工程的方法來設計模具。此外模具工程也提供塑膠工業相關的從業人員瞭解模具知識，如銷售員與售後服務人員。課程內容分為四大部分：(1)基礎─包含模具、射出機、塑膠材料、產品等。(2)模具設計的一般方針─模具佈置、澆口、流道、排氣、頂出、模具冷卻等。(3)模具的規格：模具零件與材料、模具加工、強度與疲勞。(4) 模具性能：模具壽命、成形週期、成形品之肉厚、尺寸、形狀等。 (5)特殊成形法：共射、埋入件、氣輔、覆蓋、微射出、金屬射出、陶瓷射出等。
description.en: Mold Engineering is to familiarize not only beginners in mold design but also more experienced mold designers with an engineering approach to mold design. In addition, mold engineering is also recommended mold knowledge to any individuals, such as sales and service personnel, in the plastic industry who need to understand mold in their activities. This course is divided into four sections: (1) Basics about Mold, Injection Machine, Plastics, and Products. (2) General Mold Design Guideline: mold layout, gate, runner, venting, ejection, mold cooling. (3) Specification of the Mold: mold parts and material, mold machining, strength and fatigue. (4) Mold Performance: mold life, cycle time, wall thickness, product size and shape. (5) Special Injection Molding: Coinjection molding, Insert molding, Gas-assistant injection molding, over molding, micro injection molding, Metal injection molding, Ceramic injection molding.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹電腦在工程設計應用為主，內容有電腦輔助繪圖含電腦三維實體模型建立、電腦模擬、最佳設計、有限元素分析等。
description.en: This course introduces the computer aided engineering techniques applied in mechanical engineering design. The course contents will include topics on computer aided design and draft including the creation of 3D solid model, computer simulation, Optimization technique, and finite element analysis techniques

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、電子束、離子束、電漿、鑽石、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，應用電腦化資訊處理設備以監控、診斷及調適製程，以達到智慧型製造的目的。
description.en: Introducing newest manufacturing technology.  Applying  physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials, using advanced power source and tools like laser, electron beam, ion beam, plasma, diamond, chemical react agents, adapting the demand for producing small and precision parts, Implementing computerized data processing facilities to control, monitor, diagnose, adapt manufacturing process, in order to achieve the idea of intelligent manufacturing.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

notes: 限博士班 綜科館708室

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生瞭解教育與社會關係，從而能自教育的社會基礎理論觀點來從事教育決策，分析教育制度，探求教學原則，解決教育問題。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The object of this course is to introduce the students the understanding of the relationship between education and society. It presents the students with the relation between education and the main sociological theories, such as socialization, social structure, social change. It also offer students with the social condition of schools, the teacher*s role, the teacher groups and the teacher*s social status. After finishing this course, the students can use the knowledge learned from this course to make educational decision, analyze educational systems, study the instructional principles and solve educational problems in view of the basic theories of sociology of education, and thus lead to achieve the educational goal.

description.zh: 本科目將由認識地球上太陽能之基本熱輻射理論，結合各種不同形式之太陽能源有效利用裝置，討論太陽能之有效利用方式及相關系統技術。以期在既有太陽能利用技術上，發揮更有效率的太陽能源工程系統設計，奠定未來21世紀太陽能源利用之高效率化基礎。
description.en: The aim of this course is to discuss three individual topics of more specialized nature: large PV systems, photo-voltaic under concentrated sunlight and the hydrogen economy. After completing this course the students should be able to:1. Understand the specific features of large PV systems, an    examine their economic and technical characteristics.2. Explain the advantages and disadvantages of concentrator    PV systems, and discuss their operation.3. Analyze the structure of the hydrogen economic and show    its feasibility and future   potential.

description.zh: 本課程介紹熱能交換原理與熱交換相關之工程技術。內容包括：熱交換器之基礎原理、熱交換器之分類與應用、熱交換效率分析、熱傳增強技術、散熱鰭片效率與形狀分析、各種熱交換器之設計與計算。
description.en: Introduction to the principles and the technology of heat exchangers.  The subjects include: fundamentals of heat exchangers, classifications and applications of heat exchangers, analysis of heat exchanger effectiveness, heat transfer enhancement techniques, fin efficiency and fin shape analysis, design and calculation of various types of heat exchangers.

description.zh: 車輛排放之空氣污染物，包括：一氧化碳CO、碳氫化合物HC、氮氧化物NOx、及粒狀污染物之成因分析，探討各項技術，如稀油燃燒、層狀燃燒、均質壓燃(HCCI)、選擇性觸媒(SCR)、電熱觸媒等之發展趨勢，以及因應污染法規之對策。
description.en: Analysis of the exhaust emissions formation from motor vehicles, Such As: carbon monoxide (CO), hydrocarbons (HC), nitrogen oxide (NOx), and particulate matter (PM). To discuss the trend of new technologies, such as: lean burn, stratified charge combustion, homogeneous charge compression ignition, selective catalytic reactor (SCR), electric heated catalytic converter, etc. Evaluating the technology strategy for new emission regulations

notes: 車輛所與碩士在職專班合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 岩石工程是一門應用的課程，它的重點在於把基本的岩石力學的原理，運用在實際的工程問題上，因此，這門課將介紹岩石力學在岩石邊坡、岩石基礎、及岩石隧道上的應用。上課的學生在完成這門課之後，應該對這三大類的問題都有清楚的了解。為了使沒有上過岩石力學的學生也能進入狀況，這門課會先對岩體分類法（如RMR法及Q法）及立體投影圖加以回顧，然後再進行岩石邊坡工程、岩石基礎工程、及岩石隧道工程的介紹。「岩石工程」的課程大綱如下：
description.en: The focus of this course is the application of the basic principles of rock mechanics.  Three types of applications are to be covered in this semester-long course: rock slopes, rock foundations, and rock tunnels.  The students are expected to complete assignments in each of the above three categories.  To prepare students with no previous academic work in rock mechanics, this course will review the classification systems of rock masses (such as the RMR and the Q systems).  Also, the stereographic projection is a required tool, which will be introduced in this course.

name.zh: 進階半導體與光電廠務設施
name.en: Advanced course on facility system of semiconductor and photonic fabrication plants.

description.zh: 本課程為半導體與光電廠務設進階課程, 主要針對半導體與光電廠務設施作深入的論述，課程包含廠務設施的九大系統：冰水機系統、排氣系統、電力監控系統、壓縮空氣系統、氮氣系統、純水系統、真空系統、製程冷卻水系統及外氣空調系統。期使修習本課程之學生有一和實務聯結之機會，並和理論作相相互映證。有校外教學且學生必需完成一小型計劃.
description.en: This advanced course aims to provide students a broad scope of hand-on knowledge on the facility system of a semiconductor or photonic fabrication factory. The facility system includes nine sub-systems: chilled water system, exhaust air system, compressed air system, process cooling water (PCW) system, vacuum system, ultra pure water (UPW) system, power and monitoring system, nitrogen system and make-up air system. Course material is basically based on and closely linked with field operational experience. A factory visit tour will be arranged. A mini-project will be carried by participating students.

description.zh: 泰勒多項式，求根法，數值微分與積分，差分式，誤差分析，矩陣分解，微分方程數值解，數值解軟體應用
description.en: Taylor series, equation solving, numerical differentiation and integration, difference equations, error analysis, matrix equation solving, solving differential equations, numerical code application

description.zh: 介紹產品設計初期形成設計策略所必需了解的美學、機能及工程等因素，並講授產品分析之基本理論與方法。藉由實際案例的說明與練習使學習者體會產品分析之方法並討論分析結果之意涵。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and methods of product analysis, which is one of the major sources of understanding the design of esthetic, functional and engineering details in one specific product group. Case study will be carried out with implication of the results discussed followed by practical exercise in analysing a specific group of product.

When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

HVAC's energy saving & energy efficient planning.

description.zh: 21世紀雲端大數據快速運算，與有線無線高速傳輸的「雲通世代」，已帶領人類從工業量產的工業經濟時代，經由知識經濟，體驗經濟，進入了產業服務化，服務產業化，以顧客價值為道向的服務經濟時代。使用者體驗導向設計，與設計思考，己成為今日工業與企業經營教育重要的一環。本課程將以美國史丹佛大學D--School「設計思考」(Design Thinking) 的訓練模式為主軸，輔以左右腦活用的「創造力發展原理」，加上服務經濟時代，「服務設計思考」（Service Design Thinking) 組成本創意與創新思維課程內容。
description.en: In today's could big data calculation and high speed communication Era,  the changing of Social、economic、and technology，Forces human being has to transfer ，from mass production Industrial economic（Hard wear oriented)，trough knowledge economic 、experience economic， to today's customer oriented service economic（Soft wear oriented)。Human Centric Design & design thinking will be one of the key factor for today's industry and management Education。This course will base on the material and approach developed from Stanford D--School，and coop with creative engineering and the service design thinking，to form a Creative & innovation design theory and and project practice program。
